original: bgom las ldog par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: bgom las ldog par mi 'gyur te //
translated: One does not stop going on that being gone over,

original: song dang ma song las kyang min //
analyzed: song dang ma song las kyang min //
translated: Nor on that not yet gone over, nor on that being traversed.

original: zhes 'gro ba la sun 'byin pa brjod pa de bzhin du gnas pa dgag pa la yang /
analyzed: zhes 'gro ba la sun 'byin pa brjod pa de bzhin du gnas pa dgag pa la yang /
translated: Just as the refutation of going was expressed, so the refutation of resting is similar:

original: gnas bzhin pa las mi ldog ste //
analyzed: gnas bzhin pa las mi ldog ste //
translated: One does not stop resting on that being rested on,

original: gnas dang mi gnas las kyang min//
analyzed: gnas dang mi gnas las kyang min//
translated: Nor on that not being rested on, nor on that being traversed.

original: zhes 'gro ba dang sun 'byin pa 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes 'gro ba dang sun 'byin pa 'dra ba yin te /
translated: The refutation of going and the refutation of resting are similar.

original: de'i phyir gnas pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas pa med do //
translated: Therefore resting does not exist.

original: de med pas 'gro ba'i gnyen po gnas pa yod par smra ba rnams kyis 'gro ba grub par ga la 'gyur te /
analyzed: de med pas 'gro ba'i gnyen po gnas pa yod par smra ba rnams kyis 'gro ba grub par ga la 'gyur te /
translated: Since that does not exist, how could going be established by those who say that the opposite of resting exists?

original: de'i phyir 'gro ba rnam pa thams cad du med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gro ba rnam pa thams cad du med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore going does not exist in any way.

original: gzhan yang gal te 'gro ba yod par gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te 'gro ba yod par gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if going existed,

original: de 'gro ba po las tha dad par ram tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de 'gro ba po las tha dad par ram tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: it would have to exist as either identical to or different from the goer.

original: rnam par dpyad pa na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
translated: But when analyzed, it does not exist in any way.

original: 'gro ba de dang 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba de dang 'gro ba po //
translated: That going and the goer

original: de nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
analyzed: de nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
translated: Are not the same is also untenable.

original: 'gro ba dang ni 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ni 'gro ba po //
translated: The goer and the going

original: gzhan nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
translated: cannot be said to be different.

original: yang ji ltar mi rung zhe na //
analyzed: yang ji ltar mi rung zhe na //
translated: How is it that they cannot be said to be different?

original: bshad pa / gal te 'gro ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: bshad pa / gal te 'gro ba gang yin pa //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: de nyid 'gro po yin 'gyur na //
analyzed: de nyid 'gro po yin 'gyur na //
translated: If the goer were the very going,

original: byed pa po dang las nyid kyang //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las nyid kyang //
translated: then the performer and the performance

original: gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur //üîΩ'gro ba'i bya ba gang yin pa de gal te 'gro ba po las tha mi dad par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur // 'gro ba'i bya ba gang yin pa de gal te 'gro ba po las tha mi dad par 'gyur na ni /
translated: would be the same.üîΩThis consequence is unacceptable.

original: de'i tshe byed pa po dang bya ba yang gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro//
analyzed: de'i tshe byed pa po dang bya ba yang gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro//
translated: If the action of going were not distinct from the goer, then the performer and the performance would be the same.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni bya ba'o 'di ni byed pa po'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni bya ba'o 'di ni byed pa po'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, it would not be possible to distinguish ‚ÄúThis is the action‚Äù and ‚ÄúThis is the performer.‚Äù

original: gcod pa'i bya ba dang gcod pa po ni gcig pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcod pa'i bya ba dang gcod pa po ni gcig pa yang ma yin te /
translated: However, the action of cutting and the cutter are not the same.

original: de'i phyir 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba po yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba po yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúThe goer is the very going.‚Äù

original: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid du yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid du yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate how the goer and going do not exist as different, it is said:

original: gal te 'gro dang 'gro ba po //
analyzed: gal te 'gro dang 'gro ba po //
translated: If you imagine the goer and going

original: gzhan pa nyid du rnam brtag na //
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid du rnam brtag na //
translated: To be different,üîΩThen without a goer there would be going,

original: 'gro po med pa'i 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro por 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro po med pa'i 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro por 'gyur //
translated: And without going there would be a goer.

original: gal te 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba dag gzhan nyid du gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba dag gzhan nyid du gyur na ni /
translated: If the goer and going were different,

original: de'i tshe 'gro ba la ma ltos pa'i 'gro ba por 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'gro ba la ma ltos pa'i 'gro ba por 'gyur zhing /
translated: then at that time there would be a goer without depending on going.

original: @36b bum pa las snam bu ltar 'gro ba po la ltos pa med pa gzhan du grub pa'i 'gro ba gzung bar bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: @36b bum pa las snam bu ltar 'gro ba po la ltos pa med pa gzhan du grub pa'i 'gro ba gzung bar bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: Just as a cloth is apprehended without depending on a pot, going would be apprehended without depending on a goer.

original: byed pa po las logs su grub pa'i 'gro ba ni 'dzin pa yang ma yin pas /
analyzed: byed pa po las logs su grub pa'i 'gro ba ni 'dzin pa yang ma yin pas /
translated: But since going that is established as different from the agent is not apprehended,

original: 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: it is illogical to say that the goer is different from going. This is the established proof.

original: de'i phyir de ltar /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar /
translated: Therefore, as such,

original: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
analyzed: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
translated: If things are the same,üîΩOr if they are different,

original: grub par gyur pa yod min na //
analyzed: grub par gyur pa yod min na //
translated: If going and the goer are not established As the same or different,

original: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
analyzed: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
translated: How could these two be established?

original: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gang dag la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis gcig gi ngo bo dang gzhan gyi ngo bo grub par 'gyur ba ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gang dag la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis gcig gi ngo bo dang gzhan gyi ngo bo grub par 'gyur ba ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If going and the goer are not established in any way as the same entity or different entities, as was explained earlier,

original: de gnyis rnam pa gzhan gang du grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: de gnyis rnam pa gzhan gang du grub par 'gyur /
translated: how could these two be established in any other way?

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this reason it is said:

original: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //üîΩces gsungs te /
analyzed: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod // ces gsungs te /
translated: How could these two be established?

original: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gnyis grub pa med de snyam du dgongs pa'o /üîΩ// 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gnyis grub pa med de snyam du dgongs pa'o / // 'dir smras pa /
translated: The thought is that going and the goer are not established.

original: 'di ni 'gro ba po lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar ni 'jig rten du grags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'gro ba po lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar ni 'jig rten du grags pa yin no //
translated: Here, someone might say, ‚ÄúIt is well known in the world that Devadatta, the goer, goes.‚Äù

original: de la smra ba po tshig smra'o //
analyzed: de la smra ba po tshig smra'o //
translated: In that case, the speaker speaks words.

original: byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de 'gro'o zhes bya ba yang yin pas /
analyzed: byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de 'gro'o zhes bya ba yang yin pas /
translated: Just as it is well known that ‚Äúthe agent performs an action,‚Äù so too, ‚Äúthe goer goes‚Äù is also well known.

original: ji skad du brjod pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the error stated previously does not occur.

original: 'di yang yod pa ma yin te gang gi phyir /üîΩ'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: 'di yang yod pa ma yin te gang gi phyir / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: But this is not possible because:

original: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
analyzed: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
translated: The goer does not go.üîΩThe goer does not go.

original: 'gro ba gang gis lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar mngon par gsal ba de ni 'gro ba por gyur pa de 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar mngon par gsal ba de ni 'gro ba por gyur pa de 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: The goer who is manifest by the act of going does not go.

original: yin par mi 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: yin par mi 'gyur ba'am /
translated: He would not be a goer.

original: byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that he is not an agent.

original: 'di ltar / gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med //
translated: Because there is no goer prior to going.

original: de'i 'gro ba'i snga rol ni de 'gro ba'i sngon rol lo //
analyzed: de'i 'gro ba'i snga rol ni de 'gro ba'i sngon rol lo //
translated: Prior to going means prior to the goer‚Äôs going.

original: gal te 'gro ba'i snga rol du 'gro ba po grub par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba'i snga rol du 'gro ba po grub par 'gyur na ni /
translated: If the goer were established prior to going,

original: de der 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhig go //
analyzed: de der 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhig go //
translated: then he would go there.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur /üîΩlha sbyin gang zhig don gzhan du gyur pa'i grong ngam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur / lha sbyin gang zhig don gzhan du gyur pa'i grong ngam /
translated: Because if someone goes somewhere,üîΩthen it is seen that Devadatta goes to another place,

original: grong khyer gang zhig tu 'gro bar mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: grong khyer gang zhig tu 'gro bar mthong ba yin na /
translated: such as a village or city.üîΩIn the same way, prior to the going by means of which the goer is expressed,

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes brjod pa de'i snga rol du gang zhig de 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'gro ba la mi ltos pa'i 'gro ba po zhes bya ba ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes brjod pa de'i snga rol du gang zhig de 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'gro ba la mi ltos pa'i 'gro ba po zhes bya ba ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: the so-called goer who does not rely on going does not exist.

original: ci ste 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes mngon @37a * //
analyzed: ci ste 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes mngon @37a * //
translated: But if you think that the very going by means of which the goer is

original: pa de nyid ni 'dir 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: pa de nyid ni 'dir 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: known does not here constitute going,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: then what else could it be?

original: de las gzhan 'gro'o snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de las gzhan 'gro'o snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that it is something other than that,

original: 'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: that is also not tenable.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: The goer is known by means of going.

original: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min //üîΩgang phyir 'gro po gcig po la //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min // gang phyir 'gro po gcig po la //
translated: That which is other than that does not go.üîΩBecause it is not tenable

original: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
translated: That a single goer has two goings.

original: 'gro ba por gyur pa de ni 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de las gzhan yang 'gro ba ma yin te //
analyzed: 'gro ba por gyur pa de ni 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de las gzhan yang 'gro ba ma yin te //
translated: That which is the goer does not go in the going by which it is manifest as a goer, nor in another going.

original: 'gro ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that there would be two goings.

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon par gsal ba dang / 'gro ba por gyur nas gzhan gang zhig 'gro'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon par gsal ba dang / 'gro ba por gyur nas gzhan gang zhig 'gro'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The going by which the goer is manifest, and the going in virtue of which the goer goes after having come into existence.

original: 'gro ba 'di gnyis su thal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di gnyis su thal bar 'gyur na /
translated: If it followed that there were two goings,

original: 'gro ba po gcig la 'gro ba gnyis kyang med pas 'di ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba po gcig la 'gro ba gnyis kyang med pas 'di ni mi rigs so //
translated: then since there is not two goings for one goer, this is not tenable.

original: 'dis ni smra ba po tshig smra'o zhes pa dang / byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes bya ba yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni smra ba po tshig smra'o zhes pa dang / byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes bya ba yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also refutes the statement ‚ÄúThe speaker speaks,‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe agent performs the action.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir de ltar /üîΩ'gro bo yin par gyur ba ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar / 'gro bo yin par gyur ba ni //
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'gro rnams gsum du 'gro mi byed //üîΩma yin par ni gyur de yang //
analyzed: 'gro rnams gsum du 'gro mi byed // ma yin par ni gyur de yang //
translated: The goer does not go in any of the three kinds of going.

original: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //üîΩyin dang ma yin gyur pa yang //
analyzed: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed // yin dang ma yin gyur pa yang //
translated: The non-goer does not go in any of the three kinds of going.üîΩThat which is both the goer and the non-goer does not go in any of the three kinds of going.

original: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
analyzed: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
translated: That which is neither the goer nor the non-goer does not go in any of the three kinds of going.

original: de la 'dir 'gro bar bya ba nas 'gro ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir 'gro bar bya ba nas 'gro ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Here, that which is to be gone over is called ‚Äúgoing. ‚Äù

original: de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni /
translated: With regard to that, one who is a goer

original: gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: is one who possesses the action of going.

original: 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa ni 'gro ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa ni 'gro ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: One who is not a goer is one who is devoid of the action of going.

original: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo gang yin pa'o //
translated: One who is both a goer and not a goer is one who has the nature of both.

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba yang 'gro ba'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i sgo nas rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba yang 'gro ba'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i sgo nas rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, going should be understood in three ways, in terms of being related to the action of going.

original: de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur pa dang / yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de //
analyzed: de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur pa dang / yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de //
translated: With regard to that, one who is a goer does not perform the three kinds of going‚Äîthat which has been gone over, that over which he is going, and that over which he has yet to go.

original: 'di yang las dang byed pa brtag pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang las dang byed pa brtag pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained in the examination of action and agent.

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed la /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed la /
translated: In the same way, one who is not a goer does not perform the three kinds of going.

original: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur par yang mi byed do zhes de nyid las ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur par yang mi byed do zhes de nyid las ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is taught in that text.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad na /
translated: Because when analyzed in this way,

original: 'gro ba po dang bgrod pa dang 'gro ba rnams yod pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang bgrod pa dang 'gro ba rnams yod pa ma yin pa /
translated: the goer, going, and the path are not existent.

original: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba yod ma yin //üîΩzhes bya'o // @37b ji skad du /
analyzed: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba yod ma yin // zhes bya'o // @37b ji skad du /
translated: Therefore, going, the goer, and the path do not exist.

original: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
translated: As it is said in the S≈´tra of the Teaching of Aksayamati:

original: btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni bsdu ba'i tshig go / btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni bsal ba'i tshig go //üîΩgang la bsdu ba'i tshig med pa dang / bsal ba'i tshig med pa de la 'ong ba yang med /üîΩ'gro ba yang med do //
analyzed: btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni bsdu ba'i tshig go / btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni bsal ba'i tshig go // gang la bsdu ba'i tshig med pa dang / bsal ba'i tshig med pa de la 'ong ba yang med / 'gro ba yang med do //
translated: ‚ÄúVenerable Subh≈´ti, coming is a term that subsumes; Venerable Subh≈´ti, going is a term that excludes.

original: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa ni /
analyzed: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa ni /
translated: That which is neither a term that subsumes nor a term that excludes is neither coming nor going.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: That which is neither coming nor going is the going of the noble ones.‚Äù

original: gal te sa bon nyid myu gur 'pho ba yin na ni de sa bon nyid yin gyi myu gu ma yin pa dang / rtag pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sa bon nyid myu gur 'pho ba yin na ni de sa bon nyid yin gyi myu gu ma yin pa dang / rtag pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the seed itself were to transform into the sprout, then it would be the seed itself and not the sprout, and the error of permanence would ensue.

original: 'on te myu gu gzhan nas 'ong na ni rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'on te myu gu gzhan nas 'ong na ni rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur na /
translated: But if the sprout were to come from elsewhere, the error of causelessness would ensue.

original: rgyu med pa ni skye ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa ni skye ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But that which is causeless does not arise,

original: bong bu'i rva bzhin no //
analyzed: bong bu'i rva bzhin no //
translated: like the horn of an ass.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: For this very reason, the Lord also said:

original: sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te //
analyzed: sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te //
translated: Just as the sprout is not the seed,

original: sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min //
analyzed: sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min //
translated: The seed is not the sprout,

original: de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te //
analyzed: de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te //
translated: It is not different from it, nor is it just that,

original: de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do //
translated: So too, there is neither permanence nor impermanence.

original: zhes bya ba dang / rgya las rgya'i 'bur ni snang mod kyi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / rgya las rgya'i 'bur ni snang mod kyi //

original: rgya de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin //
analyzed: rgya de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin //

original: de la de med gzhan la ma yin te //
analyzed: de la de med gzhan la ma yin te //

original: de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med //
analyzed: de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med //
translated: So too, there is neither permanence nor annihilation.

original: ces bya ba dang / me long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / me long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la //

original: bud med kha bzhin brgyan pas bltas pa na ;
analyzed: bud med kha bzhin brgyan pas bltas pa na ;

original: / byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas //
analyzed: / byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas //

original: 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu rgyug / bzhin ni der yang 'pho ba ma yin te //
analyzed: 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu rgyug / bzhin ni der yang 'pho ba ma yin te //

analyzed: gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin mi rnyed //

original: rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags bskyed pa ltar //
analyzed: rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags bskyed pa ltar //

analyzed: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis // zhes gsungs so //
translated: know that all phenomena are like that.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

original: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
analyzed: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
translated: In the noble King of SamƒÅdhi S≈´tra it says:

original: de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi //
analyzed: de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi //

original: rgyal ba de ni ting nge 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad //
analyzed: rgyal ba de ni ting nge 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad //

analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste //

original: 'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med //
analyzed: 'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med //

analyzed: chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin //

original: mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni //
analyzed: mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni //

original: las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za //
analyzed: las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za //

original: 'khor ba na yang @38a * //
analyzed: 'khor ba na yang @38a * //
translated: ‚ÄúEven in sa·πÉsƒÅra,

original: dkar nag 'bras bu smin //
analyzed: dkar nag 'bras bu smin //

original: rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te //

analyzed: las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med // de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min //
translated: There is no accumulation of karma, nor any place where it remains.üîΩ‚ÄúIt is not the case that what is done is not experienced,

original: gzhan gyis byas pa tshol bar gyur pa'ang med //
analyzed: gzhan gyis byas pa tshol bar gyur pa'ang med //

original: 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med //
analyzed: 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med //

original: thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min //

analyzed: 'di ni lha gnas 'jug pa dag pa min //

original: sems can spyod pa rab zhi 'jug pa med //
analyzed: sems can spyod pa rab zhi 'jug pa med //

original: srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med //
analyzed: srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med //

analyzed: rgyun rnams rtag tu stong zhing mtshan ma med //

original: skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas //
analyzed: skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas //

original: stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs //
analyzed: stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs //
translated: The powers, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s, and the power of the ten powers,

analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog gyur ba'i mchog / dkar po'i chos mchog yon tan bsags pa ste //
translated: This is the supreme bull among the buddhas, the accumulation of the qualities of the supreme bright qualities,üîΩThe supreme qualities, wisdom, dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s, and powers,üîΩThe supreme miracles and magical manifestations,

analyzed: yon tan ye shes gzungs dang stobs mchog dang // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i mchog / mngon shes mchog lnga thob pa dam pa'i tshul //

original: zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o //

original: de bzhin du /üîΩtshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong /
analyzed: de bzhin du / tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong /
translated: Similarly,üîΩ‚ÄúVenerable ones, where are you going?

original: gang nas lhags /
analyzed: gang nas lhags /
translated: Where have you come from?‚Äù

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,

analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to zhes gsungs so // slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Venerable Subh≈´ti, the Blessed One taught the Dharma because there is no going anywhere and no coming from anywhere.

original: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on going and coming, the second chapter of the commentary on the Root Verses of the Middle Way called ‚ÄúThe Bright Lamp.‚Äù

original: // /'dir smras pa /
analyzed: // /'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

analyzed: gal te yang 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po dang bgrod pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
translated: ‚ÄúEven though going, a goer, and that which is traversed do not exist,

original: de lta na yang gsung rab las rab tu grub pa la ltos nas lta ba po dang blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba la sogs pa rnams yod par khas blang dgos so //
analyzed: de lta na yang gsung rab las rab tu grub pa la ltos nas lta ba po dang blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba la sogs pa rnams yod par khas blang dgos so //
translated: nevertheless, in dependence on what is well known in the scriptures, one must accept that the seer, the seen, seeing, and so on exist.‚Äù

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: In this regard, it is said:

original: chos mngon pa las /
analyzed: chos mngon pa las /
translated: In the Abhidharma,

analyzed: lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
translated: It is said that seeing, hearing, smelling, Tasting, touching, and mental cognition

original: dbang po drug ste de dag gi /
analyzed: dbang po drug ste de dag gi /

original: spyod yul blta bar bya la sogs //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: spyod yul blta bar bya la sogs // zhes gsungs so //

original: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, seeing and so on exist essentially.

original: yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin te /
translated: They do not exist, because

analyzed: 'dir @38b mig ni lta bas na lta bar byed pa yin la / gzugs ni de'i yul nyid yin par nye bar bstan to //
translated: here, the eye is seeing, and form is its object.

analyzed: ji ltar lta ba gzugs la mi lta ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / lta de rang gi bdag nyid ni //
translated: In order to show that seeing does not see form, it is said:üîΩThat seeing does not see

analyzed: de la lta ba ma yin nyid // gang zhig bdag la mi lta ba //

analyzed: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //

original: de la lta ba de rang gi bdag nyid la lta ba ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de la lta ba de rang gi bdag nyid la lta ba ma yin pa nyid de /

original: rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for something to act on itself.

original: de'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta ba'i phyir rna ba la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa la'ang mi lta bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta ba'i phyir rna ba la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa la'ang mi lta bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because it does not see itself, like the ear and so on, it does not see blue and so on.

original: de'i phyir lta ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, seeing does not exist.

original: gal te yang lta ba rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang lta ba rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta mod kyi /

original: 'di ltar me ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid kho na sreg par byed kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar me ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid kho na sreg par byed kyi /

original: rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no //

original: de bzhin du lta ba yang gzhan kho na la lta'i /
analyzed: de bzhin du lta ba yang gzhan kho na la lta'i /
translated: In the same way, seeing sees only other things,

original: rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not its own intrinsic nature.

original: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te gang gi phyir /üîΩlta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te gang gi phyir / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: This is not reasonable, becauseüîΩThe example of fire

original: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
translated: is not able to prove seeing.

original: lta ba rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis me'i dpe nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa des ni nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lta ba rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis me'i dpe nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa des ni nus pa ma yin te /
translated: The example of fire that you have presented is not able to prove seeing,üîΩbecause it is not appropriate, it is not powerful, and it is not reasonable.

original: mi chog pa dang / mthu med pa dang / mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgang gi phyir /
analyzed: mi chog pa dang / mthu med pa dang / mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to // gang gi phyir /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: song dang ma song bgom pa yis //üîΩde ni ltar bcas lan btab po //
analyzed: song dang ma song bgom pa yis // de ni ltar bcas lan btab po //
translated: Because of where one has gone, where one has not gone, and where one goes,üîΩthis has been answered with seeing.

original: lta ba dang lhan cig gnas pas ni ltar bcas so //
analyzed: lta ba dang lhan cig gnas pas ni ltar bcas so //
translated: One who abides together with seeing is one who has seeing.

original: khyod kyis lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir me'i dpe bstan pa gang yin pa de yang dngos kyi don lta ba dang lhan cig lan btab po ste sun phyung ba yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyis lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir me'i dpe bstan pa gang yin pa de yang dngos kyi don lta ba dang lhan cig lan btab po ste sun phyung ba yin no //
translated: The example of fire that you taught in order to establish seeing is also refuted, that is, responded to, together with the actual point, seeing.üîΩBy what?

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: He says:

original: song dang ma song bgom pa yis //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: song dang ma song bgom pa yis // zhes gsungs te /
translated: By the gone, not gone, and that being gone over.

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar song ba la mi 'gro zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar song ba la mi 'gro zhing /
translated: Because, just as it is not going on that being gone over,

original: ma song ba la yang ma yin la /üîΩbgom pa la ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ma song ba la yang ma yin la / bgom pa la ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: nor is it on that not gone over,üîΩnor is it on that being gone over,

original: mes kyang bsregs pa la mi sreg la /
analyzed: mes kyang bsregs pa la mi sreg la /
translated: in the same way, fire does not burn that being burned,üîΩnor does it burn that not burned.

original: ma bsregs pa la yang mi sreg go zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshungs pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma bsregs pa la yang mi sreg go zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshungs pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: And so on.üîΩMoreover, just as it is not going on that being gone over, that not gone over, and that being gone over,

original: yang ji ltar song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa la mi 'gro ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: yang ji ltar song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa la mi 'gro ba de bzhin du /
translated: in the same way:

original: re zhig bltas la mi lta ste /
analyzed: re zhig bltas la mi lta ste /

original: ma bltas pa la'ang lta ba min //
analyzed: ma bltas pa la'ang lta ba min //

original: bltas dang ma bltas ma gtogs par //
analyzed: bltas dang ma bltas ma gtogs par //

original: lta bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩzhes bya ba la @39a * //
analyzed: lta bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩzhes bya ba la @39a * //
translated: one does not see while seeing.

original: sogs pa brjod par bya'o //üîΩji ltar / re zhig 'gro po mi 'gro ste //
analyzed: sogs pa brjod par bya'o // ji ltar / re zhig 'gro po mi 'gro ste //
translated: and so on.üîΩJust as it was explained that ‚Äúthe goer does not go,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de bzhin du /
translated: so too,

original: re zhig sreg po mi sreg ste //
analyzed: re zhig sreg po mi sreg ste //
translated: ‚Äúthe burner does not burn,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhing /
translated: and so on.

original: re zhig lta po mi lta ste //
analyzed: re zhig lta po mi lta ste //
translated: Just as it was explained that ‚Äúthe seer does not see,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas me'i dpe dang lhan cig tu song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag dang sun dbyung ba mtshungs pa de'i phyir me bzhin du lta ba grub po zhes bya ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas me'i dpe dang lhan cig tu song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag dang sun dbyung ba mtshungs pa de'i phyir me bzhin du lta ba grub po zhes bya ba mi rigs so //
translated: and so on, the example of fire is similar to the critique of the gone, not gone, and that being gone over. Therefore it is illogical to say ‚Äúseeing is established like fire.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir lta ba rang gi bdag nyid bzhin du gzhan dag la yang lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba rang gi bdag nyid bzhin du gzhan dag la yang lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus it is not established that ‚Äújust as seeing does not see itself, it does not see other things either.‚ÄùüîΩWhen that is so,

original: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then it is said:

original: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
translated: When it does not see the slightest thing,

original: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not a seer.üîΩHow could it be tenable

original: lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //üîΩde ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //üîΩde ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
translated: to say ‚Äúseeing sees‚Äù?

original: gang gi tshe di ltar cung zad kyang mi lta bas lta bar byed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe mi lta ba lta bar byed pa nyid mi rigs pa'i phyir lta bas na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe di ltar cung zad kyang mi lta bas lta bar byed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe mi lta ba lta bar byed pa nyid mi rigs pa'i phyir lta bas na /

analyzed: lta bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa mi rigs te /

analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa bzhin no // gal te yang tshigs su bcad pa sdeb pa'i ngor lta bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i mjug thogs su /

original: lta byed lta bas yin zhes byar //üîΩzhes bya bar 'don mod kyi de lta na yang 'chad pa'i dus su //
analyzed: lta byed lta bas yin zhes byar // zhes bya bar 'don mod kyi de lta na yang 'chad pa'i dus su //

analyzed: lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //
translated: it should be recited as ‚ÄúIt sees because it is seeing.‚Äù

original: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gdon par bya'o //üîΩgzhan yang 'dir lta bas na lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa ni lta ba'i bya ba dang mi lta ba'i rang bzhin can zhig gam /
analyzed: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur // zhes gdon par bya'o // gzhan yang 'dir lta bas na lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa ni lta ba'i bya ba dang mi lta ba'i rang bzhin can zhig gam /
translated: How could that be logical?üîΩMoreover, here it is said, ‚ÄúIt sees because it is seeing,‚Äù but is it the activity of seeing that is related to that which has the nature of not seeing,

original: lta ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa zhig 'brel bar rtog grang /
analyzed: lta ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa zhig 'brel bar rtog grang /
translated: or is it the nature of seeing that is related to that which has the nature of not seeing?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /üîΩlta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
translated: It is not tenable that both are so.üîΩThe seeing of seeing does not exist.

original: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
analyzed: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
translated: The nonseeing of seeing does not exist.

original: re zhig lta ba'i rang bzhin can lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa ni yang lta bas na zhes bya ba dang 'brel bar mi 'thad de /
analyzed: re zhig lta ba'i rang bzhin can lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa ni yang lta bas na zhes bya ba dang 'brel bar mi 'thad de /
translated: First, it is not tenable to say that that which has the nature of seeing and is related to the activity of seeing sees again by means of seeing.

original: lta ba'i bya ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / lta bar byed pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba'i bya ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / lta bar byed pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that the activity of seeing would be twofold, and because it would follow that the seer would be twofold.

original: lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang mi lta ste /
analyzed: lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang mi lta ste /
translated: Also, that which does not have the nature of seeing does not see.

original: lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir sor mo'i rtse mo bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir sor mo'i rtse mo bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Because it is devoid of the activity of seeing, like the tip of a finger.

original: gang gi tshe de ltar /üîΩlta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
translated: When it is said:üîΩThe seeing of seeing does not exist.

original: lta ba yin pa min lta nyid //
analyzed: lta ba yin pa min lta nyid //
translated: The nonseeing of seeing does not exist.

original: yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Then this should be applied:üîΩHow could it be tenable

original: lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //üîΩde ni ji ltar @39b rigs par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di nyid dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //üîΩde ni ji ltar @39b rigs par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di nyid dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: To say that seeing sees?

original: kha cig skye bzhin par 'gyur ba chos tsam po 'di ni bya ba med par skye bas 'gag kyang yul cung zad kyang mi lta ste /
analyzed: kha cig skye bzhin par 'gyur ba chos tsam po 'di ni bya ba med par skye bas 'gag kyang yul cung zad kyang mi lta ste /
translated: Some think that this mere phenomenon, which is in the process of arising, arises without activity, and so, although it ceases, it does not see any object whatsoever.

original: bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is without activity.

original: de'i phyir lta ba mi lta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no snyam du sems so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba mi lta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no snyam du sems so //
translated: Therefore, this statement, ‚ÄúSeeing does not see,‚Äù is an affirmation of what is already established.

original: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: gal te tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i bya ba med na ni /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i bya ba med na ni /
translated: If there is no activity that is a part of convention,

original: de'i tshe chos tsam po yang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe chos tsam po yang med par 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time mere phenomena would not exist,

original: bya ba dang bral pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba dang bral pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: because they would be devoid of activity, like a sky flower.

original: des na bya ba dang bral ba'i chos tsam du go ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: des na bya ba dang bral ba'i chos tsam du go ga la 'gyur /
translated: So how could mere phenomena be devoid of activity?

original: de'i phyir gal te tha snyad kyi bden pa yin na ni chos tsam po bzhin du bya ba yang khas long la //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te tha snyad kyi bden pa yin na ni chos tsam po bzhin du bya ba yang khas long la //
translated: Therefore, if it is conventional truth, then like mere phenomena, activity should be accepted.

original: 'on te de kho na nyid sems na ni bya ba bzhin du chos tsam po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te de kho na nyid sems na ni bya ba bzhin du chos tsam po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: But if it is reality, then like activity, mere phenomena should be accepted as nonexistent.

original: ji skad du brgya pa las /
analyzed: ji skad du brgya pa las /
translated: As CatuhÔ¨Å sÃÅataka says,

original: bya ba dang ldan rtag pa nyid //
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan rtag pa nyid //
translated: It is permanent, and has activity.

original: kun tu 'gro la bya ba med //
analyzed: kun tu 'gro la bya ba med //
translated: It is omnipresent, and has no activity.

original: bya ba med pa med dang mtshungs //
analyzed: bya ba med pa med dang mtshungs //
translated: That which has no activity is like a non-existent thing.

original: bdag med la khyod cis mi dga' //üîΩzhes bshad do //
analyzed: bdag med la khyod cis mi dga' // zhes bshad do //
translated: Why do you not like selflessness?

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyi tshul 'di gnod par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyi tshul 'di gnod par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, this other system is not harmful.

original: kho bo cag la grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon du yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kho bo cag la grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon du yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And for us, the error of proving what is already established does not arise.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say:

original: lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes byed pa po sgrub pa ni khas mi len gyi /
analyzed: lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes byed pa po sgrub pa ni khas mi len gyi /
translated: We do not accept the proof of the agent by saying that since it sees, it is the seer.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'dir lta bar byed pas na lta ba'o zhes byed pa sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir lta bar byed pas na lta ba'o zhes byed pa sgrub pa yin te /
translated: Here, we prove the action by saying that since it sees, it is seeing.

original: des na ji skad smras pa'i skyon du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na ji skad smras pa'i skyon du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the error that we have charged you with does not arise.

original: gang zhig byed par gyur ba'i lta ba 'dis lta bar byed pa de ni lta ba po yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig byed par gyur ba'i lta ba 'dis lta bar byed pa de ni lta ba po yin la /
translated: That which sees by means of the seeing that is the action is the seer.

original: 'di yang rnam par shes pa'am bdag yin yang rung ste yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang rnam par shes pa'am bdag yin yang rung ste yod pa nyid do //
translated: And this is either consciousness or the self, and it exists.

original: byed pa po yod pa las kyang lta ba grub pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po yod pa las kyang lta ba grub pa yin no //
translated: The seer is established from the existence of the one who sees.

original: brjod par bya ste /üîΩlta ba nyid kyis lta ba po'ang //
analyzed: brjod par bya ste / lta ba nyid kyis lta ba po'ang //
translated: We reply:üîΩThe seer should be understood

original: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
translated: to be refuted in the same way as seeing.

original: de la ji ltar /
analyzed: de la ji ltar /
translated: Here, just as it was said that seeing does not see

original: lta de rang gi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: lta de rang gi bdag nyid ni //
translated: itself, etc.,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lta ba la sun 'byin par brjod pa de bzhin du lta ba po yang sun 'byin pa lta ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lta ba la sun 'byin par brjod pa de bzhin du lta ba po yang sun 'byin pa lta ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o //
translated: in the same way, the seer should be understood to be refuted in the same way as seeing.

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩlta po rang gi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / lta po rang gi bdag nyid ni //
translated: For example, it is said:üîΩThe seer does not see

original: lta bas lta ba ma yin nyid //üîΩgang zhig bdag la mi lta ba //
analyzed: lta bas lta ba ma yin nyid // gang zhig bdag la mi lta ba //
translated: itself by means of seeing.üîΩHow could that which does not see itself

original: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
analyzed: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
translated: see something else?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be said.

original: de'i phyir lta ba bzhin du lta ba po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po //üîΩ'dir @40a * //üîΩsmras pa / lta ba po ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba bzhin du lta ba po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po // 'dir @40a * // smras pa / lta ba po ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, just like seeing, the seer also does not exist. This is established.

original: de'i las dang byed pa yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i las dang byed pa yod pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, someone says: The seer exists because its object and action exist.

original: 'dir gang med pa de la ni las dang byed pa med de /
analyzed: 'dir gang med pa de la ni las dang byed pa med de /
translated: But that which does not exist has neither action nor agent.

original: dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the son of a barren woman.

original: byed pa po la ni byed pa lta ba dang blta bar bya ba las kyang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po la ni byed pa lta ba dang blta bar bya ba las kyang yod pa yin te /
translated: But the agent does exist in relation to the action of seeing and the object of seeing.

original: de'i phyir gcod pa po bzhin du las dang byed pa po yod pa'i phyir lta ba po yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcod pa po bzhin du las dang byed pa po yod pa'i phyir lta ba po yod pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because the object and agent exist, like the one who cuts and that which is cut, the seer exists.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: The object of seeing and seeing do not exist.

original: de'i phyir lta ba po yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba po yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: So how could the seer exist?

original: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni lta ba po la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni lta ba po la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The object of seeing and seeing depend on the seer.

original: de yang nges par dpyad pa na //
analyzed: de yang nges par dpyad pa na //
translated: But when that is carefully examined,

original: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
analyzed: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
translated: The seer does not exist without seeing.

original: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo //
analyzed: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo //
translated: Even if seeing were abandoned,

original: 'dir lta ba po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni de lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa'am /üîΩltos pa med pa zhig tu 'gyur grang //
analyzed: 'dir lta ba po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni de lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa'am /üîΩltos pa med pa zhig tu 'gyur grang //
translated: Here, if the so-called seer exists, then it would either depend on seeing or not depend on seeing.

original: de la gal te lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa ma spangs pa'i lta ba po 'dod na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa ma spangs pa'i lta ba po 'dod na ni /
translated: If you assert that the seer is not abandoned and is dependent on seeing,

original: de'i tshe grub pa zhig gam ma grub pa zhig lta ba la ltos par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de'i tshe grub pa zhig gam ma grub pa zhig lta ba la ltos par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then at that time, either the seer who is established or the seer who is not established would be dependent on seeing.

original: de la grub pa'i lta ba po ni lta ba la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la grub pa'i lta ba po ni lta ba la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: But the seer who is established is not dependent on seeing.

original: grub par gyur nas lta ba po yang lta ba la ltos pas ci zhig byed /
analyzed: grub par gyur nas lta ba po yang lta ba la ltos pas ci zhig byed /
translated: What use is it for the seer who is established to be dependent on seeing?

original: grub pa ni slar yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa ni slar yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is established is not to be established again.

original: ci ste ma grub pa'i lta ba po lta ba la ltos so zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste ma grub pa'i lta ba po lta ba la ltos so zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the seer who is not established is dependent on seeing,

original: ma grub pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du lta ba la ltos pa med do //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du lta ba la ltos pa med do //
translated: because he is not established, he is not dependent on seeing, just like the son of a barren woman.

original: de ltar re zhig ma spangs pa ste lta ba la ltos nas lta ba por gyur pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig ma spangs pa ste lta ba la ltos nas lta ba por gyur pa med pa yin no //
translated: Thus, first, the seer does not exist in dependence on seeing, without abandoning seeing.

original: lta ba po lta ba spangs par gyur pa yang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: lta ba po lta ba spangs par gyur pa yang mi 'grub ste /
translated: Also, the seer who has abandoned seeing is not established.

original: lta ba la ltos pa med pa'i phyir te sngar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: lta ba la ltos pa med pa'i phyir te sngar bshad pa yin no //
translated: Because he is not dependent on seeing, as was previously explained.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gang gi tshe lta ba spangs pa dang / ma spangs pa'i lta ba po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gang gi tshe lta ba spangs pa dang / ma spangs pa'i lta ba po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, when the seer exists neither having abandoned seeing nor not having abandoned seeing,üîΩHow can there be the seen

original: lta bo med na blta bya dang // lta ba de dag ga la yod //
analyzed: lta bo med na blta bya dang // lta ba de dag ga la yod //
translated: And seeing when there is no seer?

original: lta ba po med na rgyu med pa'i blta bya dang lta bdag ni srid pas de dag yod pa las lta ba po grub par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: lta ba po med na rgyu med pa'i blta bya dang lta bdag ni srid pas de dag yod pa las lta ba po grub par ga la 'gyur //
translated: If there is no seer, then the seen and seeing would be without a cause. Since that is impossible, how could the seer be established from their existence?

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩblta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Here, someone might say this:üîΩThe seen and seeing do exist because their effect exists.

original: de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la ji ltar pha dang ma dag la //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro // de la ji ltar pha dang ma dag la //
translated: In this regard, it is said:üîΩJust as a son is said to arise

original: brten nas bu ni 'byung bshad pa //üîΩde bzhin mig dang gzugs brten nas //
analyzed: brten nas bu ni 'byung bshad pa // de bzhin mig dang gzugs brten nas //
translated: In dependence on a father and mother,üîΩSo it is said that consciousness arises

original: rnam par shes pa 'byung bar bshad //üîΩces bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'byung bar bshad // ces bya ba la /
translated: In dependence on the eye and forms.

original: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba la @40b brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung la /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba la @40b brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung la /
translated: In this regard, consciousness arises in dependence on the seen and seeing.

original: gsum 'dus par gyur pa las reg pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'byung zhes /
analyzed: gsum 'dus par gyur pa las reg pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'byung zhes /
translated: It is said that contact with contaminants arises from the assembly of three.

original: reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba yin la /
analyzed: reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba yin la /
translated: Feeling arises simultaneously with contact.

original: de'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin no //
translated: Craving has that feeling as its condition.

original: de ltar na srid pa'i yan lag bzhi po blta bar bya ba dang lta ba'i rgyu can dag ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na srid pa'i yan lag bzhi po blta bar bya ba dang lta ba'i rgyu can dag ni yod pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the four members of existence that are the effect of views exist.

original: de'i phyir / de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis yod do //
translated: Therefore, since their effect exists, both the object of views and views exist.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po nyid yod na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po nyid yod na /
translated: If the four, consciousness, etc., existed,

original: de gnyis yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de gnyis yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: those two would exist, but they do not exist.

original: 'di ltar blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the object of views and views do not exist,

original: rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi //
analyzed: rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi //
translated: The four, consciousness, etc.,üîΩdo not exist.

original: yod min / 'dir lta ba po med pas blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: yod min / 'dir lta ba po med pas blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Here it has been explained that because the seer does not exist, the two, the object of views and views, do not exist.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could the four such as consciousness, contact, feeling, and craving exist?

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams med do //
translated: Therefore, the four such as consciousness do not exist.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: de dag ni yod pa nyid de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni yod pa nyid de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They do exist because their effects exist.

original: 'dir sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi las skye ste /
analyzed: 'dir sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi las skye ste /
translated: Here, due to the condition of craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death arise from the four such as consciousness.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod de de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod de de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the four such as consciousness exist because their effects exist.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: In response, Aryadeva says:üîΩIf the four such as consciousness existed,

original: gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod na ni len pa la sogs pa dag yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod na ni len pa la sogs pa dag yod par 'gyur na /
translated: grasping and so on would exist.

original: gang gi tshe blta bar bya ba dang lta ba med pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /üîΩnye bar len la sogs /
analyzed: gang gi tshe blta bar bya ba dang lta ba med pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / nye bar len la sogs /
translated: When the four, consciousness and so on, do not exist because the seen and seeing do not exist,üîΩHow can appropriator and so on

original: ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur //
translated: exist?

original: nye bar len pa la sogs pa rnams yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nye bar len pa la sogs pa rnams yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Appropriator and so on do not exist.

original: da ni dbang po lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par bshad pa lta ba dang 'dra bar bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dbang po lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par bshad pa lta ba dang 'dra bar bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the remaining faculties in the same way that seeing is explained, it is said:

original: lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
analyzed: lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
translated: Seeing, hearing, smelling, Tasting, touching, and mentation,

original: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
analyzed: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
translated: The hearer, the heard, and so on,

original: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par shes par bya // zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Should be understood as explained.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn said:

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing //
translated: The eye does not see forms,

original: yid kyis chos rnams mi shes te //
analyzed: yid kyis chos rnams mi shes te //
translated: The mind does not cognize phenomena.

original: gang du 'jig rten mi 'jug pa //üîΩ'di ni bden pa'i @41a * //
analyzed: gang du 'jig rten mi 'jug pa // 'di ni bden pa'i @41a * //
translated: Where the world does not engage,

original: mchog yin no //
analyzed: mchog yin no //
translated: That is the supreme truth.

original: gang du rkyen tshogs pas mthong ba //
analyzed: gang du rkyen tshogs pas mthong ba //
translated: Where seeing occurs through the assembly of conditions,

original: 'dren pa rab tu ston mdzad pa'i //üîΩsa de don dam 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: 'dren pa rab tu ston mdzad pa'i // sa de don dam 'dzin pa ni //
translated: The guide teaches this stage.üîΩThe ultimate is apprehended in it.

original: nye bar brtags par chub par 'gyur //
analyzed: nye bar brtags par chub par 'gyur //
translated: It is fully realized in the investigation.

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni //
translated: Based on name and form,

original: mig gi rnam shes 'dir skye yang //
analyzed: mig gi rnam shes 'dir skye yang //
translated: The eye consciousness arises here.

original: gzugs ni mig la brten ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs ni mig la brten ma yin //
translated: But form is not based on the eye.

original: gzugs ni mig las 'pho ba'ang min //
analyzed: gzugs ni mig las 'pho ba'ang min //
translated: Form does not move from the eye.üîΩThese phenomena, which are selfless and unattractive,

original: bdag med mi sdug chos 'di dag / slar yang bdag dang sdug ces brtags //
analyzed: bdag med mi sdug chos 'di dag / slar yang bdag dang sdug ces brtags //
translated: Are again imagined to be a self and attractive.

original: med la log par brtags pa ste //
analyzed: med la log par brtags pa ste //
translated: They are falsely imagined in what is nonexistent.

original: de las mig gi rnam shes 'byung //
analyzed: de las mig gi rnam shes 'byung //
translated: From that, the eye consciousness arises.

original: rnam shes 'gag dang 'byung ba las //
analyzed: rnam shes 'gag dang 'byung ba las //
translated: From the cessation and arising of consciousness,

original: rnam shes zad dang 'phel bar 'thong  //
analyzed: rnam shes zad dang 'phel bar 'thong  //
translated: The yogi understands the decrease and increase of consciousness.üîΩThe yogi sees it as empty, as having no coming or going,

original: 'gar yang 'gro 'ong med stong dang // sgyu 'drar rnal 'byor pa yis mthong //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gar yang 'gro 'ong med stong dang // sgyu 'drar rnal 'byor pa yis mthong // zhes gsungs so //
translated: And as illusory.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
translated: And similarly, the noble Multitude of Jewels S≈´tra says,

original: mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te //
analyzed: mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te //
translated: The eye sees when it is complete.

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
translated: Whatever forms are seen by the eye

original: mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: are not seen when the conditions are absent at night.

original: de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin //
analyzed: de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin //
translated: Therefore, being joined or separated is a conceptual thought.üîΩThe eye, in dependence on light, sees various forms,

original: mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas //
analyzed: mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas //
translated: attractive and unattractive.

original: de ltar snang la brten te mthong bas na //
analyzed: de ltar snang la brten te mthong bas na //
translated: Thus, since it sees in dependence on light,

original: de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med //
analyzed: de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med //
translated: the eye never sees.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grag gang yin pa //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grag gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever sounds are heard that are attractive

original: de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med //
analyzed: de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med //
translated: never enter the ear.

original: der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te //
translated: They do not exist as objects that go there,

original: rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams 'byung ba yin //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams 'byung ba yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: but sounds arise by the power of conceptual thought.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgra yang gzung bya min //üîΩrmi lam lta bu mi mkhas rmongs dang chags pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgra yang gzung bya min // rmi lam lta bu mi mkhas rmongs dang chags pa'i rgyu //
translated: songs, dances, and musical sounds are not apprehended.üîΩLike dreams, they are the cause of confusion and attachment for the unwise.

original: mi mkhas kun du rtog la zhen rnams brlag 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: mi mkhas kun du rtog la zhen rnams brlag 'gyur zhing //
translated: The unwise are destroyed by clinging to conceptual thoughts.

original: skye bo byis pa nyon mongs bran bzhin bdag gyur tam //üîΩzhes gsungs so //üîΩslob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
analyzed: skye bo byis pa nyon mongs bran bzhin bdag gyur tam // zhes gsungs so // slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
translated: I will be a slave to the afflictions of childish beings.

original: dbang po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dbang po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the third chapter, the analysis of the senses, in the Ornament of Reason, a commentary on the Root of the Middle Way.

original: // /'dir smras pa /
analyzed: // /'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: gal te de ltar dbang po rnams med na //
analyzed: gal te de ltar dbang po rnams med na //
translated: ‚ÄúIf the senses do not exist in that way,

original: phung po lnga ma bkag pa'i phyir dang / dbang po rnams kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i phyir de rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phung po lnga ma bkag pa'i phyir dang / dbang po rnams kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i phyir de rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: since the five aggregates are not refuted and the senses are included within them, therefore they must exist.‚Äù

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te phung po rnams yod na de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na de @41b rnams ni med do //
analyzed: gal te phung po rnams yod na de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na de @41b rnams ni med do //
translated: If the aggregates existed, that would be the case, but they do not.

original: de la gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
translated: With regard to that, from the perspective of the form aggregate, it is said:

original: gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from the cause of form,

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Form is not observed.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from what is called form,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
translated: The cause of form is not seen.

original: de la gzugs ni 'byung ba las gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs ni 'byung ba las gyur pa'o //
translated: Form is derived from the primary elements.

original: de'i rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
translated: Its cause is the four primary elements.

original: de dag las tha dad cing gzhan du gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs ni bum pa las snam bu ltar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag las tha dad cing gzhan du gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs ni bum pa las snam bu ltar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Apart from them, form derived from the primary elements would not be perceived, just as a cloth is not perceived apart from a pot.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par te /
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par te /
translated: Apart from form,

original: gzugs las gzhan du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs las gzhan du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the cause of form would not be perceived, just as a pot is not perceived apart from a cloth.

original: dam bca' ba 'di gnyis sgrub par bzhed nas bshad pa /üîΩgzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par /
analyzed: dam bca' ba 'di gnyis sgrub par bzhed nas bshad pa / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par /
translated: In order to demonstrate the proof of these two theses, he says:üîΩApart from the cause of form,üîΩform would be without a cause.

original: gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par //üîΩthal bar 'gyur te don gang yang //
analyzed: gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par // thal bar 'gyur te don gang yang //
translated: No entity

original: rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med //
translated: is without a cause anywhere.

original: ji ltar bum pa las don gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu bum pa'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa las don gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu bum pa'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as a cloth, which is a different object from a pot, is not the cause of a pot,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po las tha dad par gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'dod na yang 'byung ba'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po las tha dad par gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'dod na yang 'byung ba'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur te //
translated: If you assert that form derived from the great elements is different from the cause of form, then it would not have the great elements as its cause.

original: rgyu med pa can du 'gyur na /
analyzed: rgyu med pa can du 'gyur na /
translated: If it were causeless,

original: don gang zhig rgyu med pa ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gang zhig rgyu med pa ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then no object would exist anywhere without a cause.

original: de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na gzugs kyi rgyu las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na gzugs kyi rgyu las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it would follow that it is causeless, form that is not included in the cause of form should not be accepted.

original: de ni gzugs las ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa //üîΩgal te gzugs ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: de ni gzugs las ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa // gal te gzugs ni ma gtogs par //
translated: In order to demonstrate how form is not different from the cause of form, it is said:üîΩIf the cause of form existed

original: gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod na ni //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod na ni //
translated: apart from form,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te //
translated: the cause would be without an effect.

original: gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe ji ltar snam bu las tha dad par grub pa'i 'khar gzhong snam bu'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bu las tha dad par 'dod pa'i rgyu yangüîΩrgyu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe ji ltar snam bu las tha dad par grub pa'i 'khar gzhong snam bu'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bu las tha dad par 'dod pa'i rgyu yang rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: so too the cause that is asserted to be different from the effect would be causeless.

original: rgyu rgyu nyid du bya ba'i rgyu ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yin na //
analyzed: rgyu rgyu nyid du bya ba'i rgyu ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yin na //
translated: The cause of a cause is the engagement of the effect.

original: tha dad par grub pa nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu la mi ltos pa'i rgyu las ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par grub pa nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu la mi ltos pa'i rgyu las ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But because it is established as different, the effect does not engage in the cause that does not rely on the effect.üîΩThat which is a cause without an effect does not exist because it is causeless, like a flower in the sky.

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni rgyu med pa can yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pa nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni /üîΩ'bras bu med @42a * //üîΩpa'i rgyu med do //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni rgyu med pa can yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pa nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni / 'bras bu med @42a * // pa'i rgyu med do //
translated: That which is a cause without an effect does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That which is a cause without an effect does not exist.

original: gzhan yang gzugs kyi rgyu 'di 'dod pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs kyi rgyu 'di 'dod pa na /
translated: Moreover, if you assert that this is the cause of form,

original: gzugs yod pa na rgyu nyid du 'dod dam /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa na rgyu nyid du 'dod dam /
translated: do you assert that it is a cause when form exists?

original: med pa na 'dod grang na /
analyzed: med pa na 'dod grang na /
translated: But if you say that form does not exist,

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
translated: then both are untenable.

original: gzugs yod na yang gzugs kyi ni //
analyzed: gzugs yod na yang gzugs kyi ni //
translated: If form exists, then the cause of form

original: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
translated: is not tenable.

original: gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi ni //
analyzed: gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi ni //
translated: If form does not exist, then the cause of form

original: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
translated: is not tenable.

original: de la gzugs yod pa na ste bdog pa na ni gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de la gzugs yod pa na ste bdog pa na ni gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
translated: If form exists, then what is the need for a cause of form?

original: med na yang ste gzugs yod pa ma yin na yang gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: med na yang ste gzugs yod pa ma yin na yang gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
translated: If form does not exist, then what is the need for a cause of form?üîΩOr, if you think that form exists, then what is the cause of that?

original: yang na de gang gi rgyu yin par brtag / de'i phyir gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi rgyu ni 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na de gang gi rgyu yin par brtag / de'i phyir gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi rgyu ni 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if form does not exist, the cause of form is not tenable.

original: ci ste gal te yang de ltar gzugs kyi rgyu mi srid mod kyi de lta na yang 'bras bu'i gzugs ni yod la /
analyzed: ci ste gal te yang de ltar gzugs kyi rgyu mi srid mod kyi de lta na yang 'bras bu'i gzugs ni yod la /
translated: But if you think that although the cause of form is not possible in this way, still resultant form exists,

original: de yod pa las rgyu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: de yod pa las rgyu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: and because it exists, its cause also exists,

original: gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
translated: then if resultant form exists, that would be so.

original: yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
analyzed: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
translated: Form without a cause

original: 'thad par mi rung rung min nyid //
analyzed: 'thad par mi rung rung min nyid //
translated: is not tenable.

original: gzugs kyi rgyu ni ji ltar med pa de ltar bshad zin to //
