original: skye bzhin pa de ni skye bzhin pa 'di yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu nges par gzung bar yang mi nus te /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa de ni skye bzhin pa 'di yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu nges par gzung bar yang mi nus te /
translated: It is also not possible to specify that which is in the process of arising as this or that which is in the process of arising.

original: ma skyes pas de'i mtshan ma ma gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma skyes pas de'i mtshan ma ma gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has not arisen, its characteristics have not been apprehended.

original: de'i phyir skye bzhin pa med pa'i phyir skye ba'i bya ba yang med pas ji ltar na skye ba med par de la brten nas skye bzhin par 'gyur /üîΩde'i phyir skye bzhin pa skye la /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye bzhin pa med pa'i phyir skye ba'i bya ba yang med pas ji ltar na skye ba med par de la brten nas skye bzhin par 'gyur / de'i phyir skye bzhin pa skye la /
translated: Therefore, since that which is in the process of arising does not exist, the action of arising also does not exist. So how could that which is in the process of arising exist in dependence on it, without arising?üîΩTherefore, it is illogical to say that that which is in the process of arising arises,

original: de yang skye bas skyed par byed do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de yang skye bas skyed par byed do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: and that it is generated by arising.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say:

original: ae ma kyi hud bdag ni gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab rnam par 'chad pa'i zol gyis bdag nyid sun 'byin par byed pa tsam la mkhas pa nyid du mngon par byed cing don dam pa'i bden pa /
analyzed: ae ma kyi hud bdag ni gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab rnam par 'chad pa'i zol gyis bdag nyid sun 'byin par byed pa tsam la mkhas pa nyid du mngon par byed cing don dam pa'i bden pa /
translated: Alas! I am skilled in merely refuting myself by the pretense of explaining the teachings of the TathƒÅgata.

original: drang srong mchog gis gsungs pa /
analyzed: drang srong mchog gis gsungs pa /
translated: The supreme sage taughtüîΩthe ultimate truth

original: rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can 'jigs 'byed pa mthong ba dang ma mthong @54a * //
analyzed: rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can 'jigs 'byed pa mthong ba dang ma mthong @54a * //
translated: You are terrified of the mere conditionality of dependent arising, which is characterized by the arising of things that are not seen and seen things that are not dependent on other things.

original: ba'i dngos po la ltos pa med pa gtan med par smra ba khyod la shin tu 'jigs te /
analyzed: ba'i dngos po la ltos pa med pa gtan med par smra ba khyod la shin tu 'jigs te /
translated: You are terrified of the utter nonexistence of things.

original: 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Here the Transcendent Lord, the TathƒÅgata, has clearly elucidated dependent arising, saying,

original: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
analyzed: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause this exists, this occurs.

original: 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci ma log par gsal bar mdzad cing /üîΩrang bzhin dang / dbang phyug dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dus dang / rdul dang / sred med kyi bu la sogs pa byed pa por smra ba bsal nas /
analyzed: 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci ma log par gsal bar mdzad cing / rang bzhin dang / dbang phyug dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dus dang / rdul dang / sred med kyi bu la sogs pa byed pa por smra ba bsal nas /
translated: Because this has arisen, this arises.‚Äù

original: dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mdzad pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi de kho na nyid bstan par mdzad pa yin la /
translated: He has eliminated the proponents of an essential nature, ƒ™shvara, svabhƒÅva, time, the all-pervading, NƒÅrƒÅya·πáa, and so on, and has taught the reality of things.

original: khyod kyis ni /
analyzed: khyod kyis ni /
translated: But you

original: skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
translated: The arisen, the non-arisen, and that which is in the process of arising

original: ji lta bur yang mi skyed pa //
analyzed: ji lta bur yang mi skyed pa //
translated: Are not produced in any way.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de sun 'byin par byed pa na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de sun 'byin par byed pa na /
translated: When you refute that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun par mdzad pa'i yul rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsad par byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun par mdzad pa'i yul rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsad par byas pa yin te /
translated: you destroy dependent origination, the object that gives rise to the TathƒÅgata.

original: de'i phyir thams cad med par smra ba pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad med par smra ba pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go //
translated: Therefore, it is enough to debate with you, who propound that everything is nonexistent.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun par mdzad pa'i yul rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyams par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun par mdzad pa'i yul rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyams par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: We do not destroy dependent origination, the object that gives rise to the TathƒÅgata.

original: khyod kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa la mos pa dang bral bas de'i don phyin ci log tu bzung nas kho bo cag la smod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: khyod kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa la mos pa dang bral bas de'i don phyin ci log tu bzung nas kho bo cag la smod par byed pa yin te /
translated: You, who are devoid of interest in the profound dependent origination, grasp its meaning incorrectly and then criticize us.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di la brten nas 'di 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs pa na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di la brten nas 'di 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs pa na /
translated: When the TathƒÅgata, the Transcendent Conqueror, said, ‚ÄúThis arises in dependence on that,‚Äù

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: he clearly taught that all phenomena are essenceless.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: This is because

original: rten cing 'byung ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: rten cing 'byung ba gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever is dependently arisen

original: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis zhi //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis zhi //
translated: That is explained to be emptiness.

original: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa'i rang bzhin can gang zhig rang gi bdag nyid kyis rang gi rang bzhin nyams pa med pa 'dzin pa de ni yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan 'ga' la yang ltos pa med cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa'i rang bzhin can gang zhig rang gi bdag nyid kyis rang gi rang bzhin nyams pa med pa 'dzin pa de ni yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan 'ga' la yang ltos pa med cing /
translated: That which has the nature of an existent thing, which is itself, and which does not relinquish its own nature, would exist, and therefore it would not depend on anything else.

original: skye ba yang med pa de'i phyir na dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas blangs pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: skye ba yang med pa de'i phyir na dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas blangs pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: And since it would not arise, how could you accept that things have essence, and yet maintain that they are dependently arisen?

original: de'i phyir khyod kho nas rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du khas blangs pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kho nas rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du khas blangs pa na /
translated: Therefore, you alone maintain that things have essence,

original: rnam pa thams cad du dngos po rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du dngos po rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and you alone destroy dependent arising.

original: de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong @54b ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong @54b ngo //
translated: Therefore, whoever sees dependent arising sees the Dharma.

original: sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i lung las na chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba la yang gnod par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i lung las na chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba la yang gnod par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: And since it is said in the scriptures, ‚ÄúWhoever sees the Dharma sees the Buddha,‚Äù you are also undermining the seeing of the Dharma and the Buddha.

original: kho bos ni sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu gang zhig la brten nas myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung la /
analyzed: kho bos ni sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu gang zhig la brten nas myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung la /
translated: We say that the effect, the sprout, arises in dependence on the cause, the seed.

original: de gnyi ga yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi ba rang bzhin dang bral par ston pa na /
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi ba rang bzhin dang bral par ston pa na /
translated: And we show that both are dependently arisen and devoid of intrinsic existence.

original: rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, we illuminate the mother of the buddhas, dependent origination, in all its aspects.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa /üîΩde'i phyir skye bzhin nyid dang ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa / de'i phyir skye bzhin nyid dang ni //
translated: And because this is so,üîΩit is clear that the arising

original: skye ba yang ni zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: skye ba yang ni zhi ba nyid //
translated: and the arising of arising are at peace.

original: ces bya bar gsal bar nges par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya bar gsal bar nges par bya'o //
translated: This is how you should understand it.

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩgang tshe skye ba yod pa na //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / gang tshe skye ba yod pa na //
translated: Here, some may say,üîΩWhen there is arising,

original: skye bzhin 'di 'byung med pa'i tshe //
analyzed: skye bzhin 'di 'byung med pa'i tshe //
translated: This arising of arising is not tenable.

original: ji ltar skye la brten nas ni //
analyzed: ji ltar skye la brten nas ni //
translated: And how could it be said

original: skye bzhin zhes ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: skye bzhin zhes ni brjod par bya //
translated: That arising gives rise to that now arising?

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir skye bzhin pa 'di zhes bya ba de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skye bzhin pa 'di zhes bya ba de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Why? Because this so-called ‚Äúnow arising‚Äù would occur in this way.

original: bum pa'i skye ba la brten nas bum pa skye bzhin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: bum pa'i skye ba la brten nas bum pa skye bzhin par 'gyur la /
translated: In dependence on the arising of the vase, the vase now arising would occur.

original: skye bzhin pa de yang skye bas skyed par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa de yang skye bas skyed par byed do zhe na /
translated: And that now arising would be given rise to by arising.

original: brjod pa 'di yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: brjod pa 'di yang mi rigs te /
translated: This statement is also illogical.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Why?

original: gal te dngos po ma skyes pa //
analyzed: gal te dngos po ma skyes pa //
translated: If an unarisen thing

original: 'ga' zhig gang na yod gyur na //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gang na yod gyur na //
translated: Existed somewhere,

original: de ni skye 'gyur dngos po de //
analyzed: de ni skye 'gyur dngos po de //
translated: Then that thing would arise.

original: med na ci zhig skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: med na ci zhig skye bar 'gyur //
translated: But if it does not exist, what arises?

original: gal te skye ba'i sngon rol na bum pa zhes bya ba ma skyes pa 'ga' zhig gang zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: gal te skye ba'i sngon rol na bum pa zhes bya ba ma skyes pa 'ga' zhig gang zhig yod na ni /
translated: If a vase, which is called ‚Äúunproduced,‚Äù existed somewhere prior to arising,

original: de skye ba'i bya ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de skye ba'i bya ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then it would arise in dependence on the activity of arising.

original: de lta bu ni cung zad kyang skye ba'i sngon rol na gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni cung zad kyang skye ba'i sngon rol na gang na yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But such a thing does not exist anywhere prior to its arising.

original: bum pa de med na yang ci zhig skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bum pa de med na yang ci zhig skye bar 'gyur /
translated: If the vase does not exist, what arises?

original: ci ste skye ba'i snga rol na bum pa med mod kyi /
analyzed: ci ste skye ba'i snga rol na bum pa med mod kyi /
translated: But if the vase does not exist prior to its arising,

original: de lta na yang skyes par gyur nas bum pa'i ming rnyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang skyes par gyur nas bum pa'i ming rnyed par 'gyur te /
translated: then having arisen, it obtains the name vase.

original: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis nyes pa med do snyam na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis nyes pa med do snyam na /
translated: Therefore, there is no error in using the name of that which will arise.

original: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This also is illogical.

original: gal te skye ba'i bya ba 'jug na ni de'i tshe da ltar bar gyur pa'i dngos pos bum pa'i brjod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te skye ba'i bya ba 'jug na ni de'i tshe da ltar bar gyur pa'i dngos pos bum pa'i brjod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If the action of arising were to occur, then at that time, the entity that has become present would obtain the name vase.

original: gang gi tshe dngos po ma 'ongs pa dang ma 'brel bas bya ba mi 'jug pa de'i tshe da ltar ba nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po ma 'ongs pa dang ma 'brel bas bya ba mi 'jug pa de'i tshe da ltar ba nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: But when the future entity is not related to the action, the action does not occur. At that time, how could the present exist?

original: ci ste bum pa ma yin pa la brten nas bya ba rtsom mo zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste bum pa ma yin pa la brten nas bya ba rtsom mo zhe na /
translated: But if the action is initiated in dependence on that which is not a vase,

original: bum pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ci zhig yin par 'os @55a * //
analyzed: bum pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ci zhig yin par 'os @55a * //
translated: What is it that is not a vase?

original: pa de brjod par bya dgos te /
analyzed: pa de brjod par bya dgos te /
translated: It must be said that it is suitable to be something.

original: yod ni snam bu'am ci yang ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
analyzed: yod ni snam bu'am ci yang ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
translated: If it exists, it would be a cloth or something that is not anything at all.

original: gal te skye bzhin pa'i snam bu yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te skye bzhin pa'i snam bu yin na ni /
translated: If it is a cloth that is in the process of arising,

original: de skyes nas bum par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de skyes nas bum par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could it become a vase after it has arisen?

original: 'on te ci yang ma yin pa zhig yin na ni /üîΩde'i tshe ji ltar de'i rten gyi bya ba 'jug pa 'am /
analyzed: 'on te ci yang ma yin pa zhig yin na ni / de'i tshe ji ltar de'i rten gyi bya ba 'jug pa 'am /
translated: But if it is something that is not anything at all,üîΩhow could the action that is its basis occur?

original: de skyes nas bum par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de skyes nas bum par 'gyur te /
translated: How could it become a vase after it has arisen?

original: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtog pa yang rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtog pa yang rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, the conception of that which will arise is not tenable in any way.

original: de'i phyir skye bas skye bzhin pa yang skyed par mi byed do zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye bas skye bzhin pa yang skyed par mi byed do zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: Therefore, it is established that arising does not cause the generation of that which is in the process of arising.

original: gzhan yang de ltar skye bzhin pa skye bar mi rigs su zin kyang //
analyzed: gzhan yang de ltar skye bzhin pa skye bar mi rigs su zin kyang //
translated: Moreover, even though it is not tenable that that which is in the process of arising arises,

original: khyod kyi lugs khas blangs nas brjod par bya ste /üîΩgal te skye ba de yis ni //
analyzed: khyod kyi lugs khas blangs nas brjod par bya ste / gal te skye ba de yis ni //
translated: we will make the following statement by assuming your standpoint.üîΩIf arising causes the generation

original: skye bzhin pa ni skyed byed na //
analyzed: skye bzhin pa ni skyed byed na //
translated: of that which is in the process of arising,

original: skye ba de ni skye ba lta //
analyzed: skye ba de ni skye ba lta //
translated: That arising gives rise to itself,

original: gang zhig gis ni skyed par byed //
analyzed: gang zhig gis ni skyed par byed //
translated: but by what is that arising itself given rise to?

original: gal te yang khyod kyi lugs kyi skye bas dngos po skye bzhin pa skyed par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang khyod kyi lugs kyi skye bas dngos po skye bzhin pa skyed par byed pa yin na /
translated: If, according to your system, arising gives rise to the entity that is in the process of arising,

original: da ni skye ba de skye ba rang ngam gzhan gang gis bskyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so //üîΩci ste skye ba 'di'i skyed par byed pa /
analyzed: da ni skye ba de skye ba rang ngam gzhan gang gis bskyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so // ci ste skye ba 'di'i skyed par byed pa /
translated: then now it must be explained by what that arising is given rise to‚Äîwhether by itself or by another.

original: skye ba gzhan rtog par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: skye ba gzhan rtog par 'gyur na ni /
translated: But if you think that the arising of this gives rise to another arising,üîΩthen the error of infinite regress would ensue.

original: de'i tshe thug pa med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe thug pa med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: As it is said:

original: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If another arising gives rise to it,

original: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: there will be the error of infinite regress.

original: 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: 'on te 'di la skye ba gzhan ma 'dod na ni de ltar yin na skye ba med par yang skye ba skye ba yin no zhes bya ba de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te 'di la skye ba gzhan ma 'dod na ni de ltar yin na skye ba med par yang skye ba skye ba yin no zhes bya ba de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But if you do not assert another arising in this regard, then it would follow that arising would arise without arising.

original: de'i phyir skye bas bskyed par bya ba'i dngos po rnams kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye bas bskyed par bya ba'i dngos po rnams kyang /
translated: Therefore, things that are generated by arisingüîΩwould arise without arising, because they are things that are arising.

original: skye ba med par skye bar 'gyur te dngos po yin pa'i phyir skye bzhin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba med par skye bar 'gyur te dngos po yin pa'i phyir skye bzhin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he said:

original: ci ste skye ba med skye na //
analyzed: ci ste skye ba med skye na //
translated: If something arises without arising,

original: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: then everything would arise in that way.

original: gzhan yang skye bas rang dang gzhan skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di la da ltar bdag cag gis skyon brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan yang skye bas rang dang gzhan skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di la da ltar bdag cag gis skyon brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: Moreover, we have already expressed the faults of the position that arising generates itself and something other.

original: gang gi phyir phyogs 'di la sun dbyung ba /üîΩre zhig yod dang med pa yang //üîΩskye bar rigs pa ma yin zhing //üîΩyod med nyid kyang ma yin zhes //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyogs 'di la sun dbyung ba / re zhig yod dang med pa yang // skye bar rigs pa ma yin zhing // yod med nyid kyang ma yin zhes //
translated: In this regard, the refutation of that position

original: gong du bstan pa nyid yin no //üîΩyod dam med pa'i don la yang //
analyzed: gong du bstan pa nyid yin no // yod dam med pa'i don la yang //
translated: has already been taught above:

original: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
analyzed: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
translated: It is not logical for something existent or nonexistentüîΩto arise.üîΩNor is it logical for something both existent and nonexistent to arise.üîΩMoreover, conditions are not suitableüîΩfor either an existent or nonexistent object.

original: zhes bya ba @55b dang / gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang // med dang yod med mi 'grub pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @55b dang / gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang // med dang yod med mi 'grub pa //
translated: Nonexistent, or both existent and nonexistent,üîΩHow could it be established as neither?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar skye ba bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar skye ba bkag pa yin no //
translated: Thus arising has been refuted earlier.

original: de'i phyir de ltar skye ba bkag pa yin dang / skye bas skye bzhin pa bskyed pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skyed do zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'di 'jug pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar skye ba bkag pa yin dang / skye bas skye bzhin pa bskyed pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skyed do zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'di 'jug pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since arising has been refuted in this way, the conception that arising generates that now arising, and that it generates itself and something other, is not tenable.

original: de'i phyir skye ba'i skye ba dang / skye bzhin pa skye ba dang / rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ga las 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba'i skye ba dang / skye bzhin pa skye ba dang / rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ga las 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could the arising of arising, the arising of that now arising, and the arising of itself and something other be established?

original: gzhan yang 'dir skye ba 'di brtags pa na /üîΩdngos po da ltar ba mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa 'gag bzhin pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dir skye ba 'di brtags pa na / dngos po da ltar ba mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa 'gag bzhin pa'am /
translated: Moreover, when this arising is investigated,üîΩdoes it relate to a present thing that is impermanent and is in the process of ceasing,

original: 'das pa pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi rtag pa nyid dang bral ba 'gag pa zhig pa ma yin pa zhig la rtog grang na /
analyzed: 'das pa pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi rtag pa nyid dang bral ba 'gag pa zhig pa ma yin pa zhig la rtog grang na /
translated: or does it relate to a past thing or a future thing that is not yet ceased?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /üîΩdngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa / dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
translated: Both are untenable.üîΩIt is not tenable that

original: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: an entity that is ceasing would arise.

original: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
translated: That which is not ceasing

original: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
translated: is not tenable as an entity.

original: de la da ltar ba 'gag bzhin pa la ni skye ba 'thad pa ma yin te yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la da ltar ba 'gag bzhin pa la ni skye ba 'thad pa ma yin te yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: With respect to that, it is not tenable that an entity that is now ceasing arises because it exists.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa 'jig pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa 'jig pa dang bral ba /
translated: The past and future are devoid of disintegration.

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa 'gag bzhin ma yin pa la yang nam mkha'i me tog ltar skye ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa 'gag bzhin ma yin pa la yang nam mkha'i me tog ltar skye ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is not ceasing, which is incompatible with the characteristics of an entity, like a sky flower, does not arise.

original: de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams la skye ba med par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams la skye ba med par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, first the nonexistence of the arising of entities has been demonstrated.

original: de'i 'og tu gnas pa dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gnas pa dpyad par bya'o //
translated: Thereafter, endurance should be investigated.

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩdngos po rnams kyi skye ba ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / dngos po rnams kyi skye ba ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: de yod na yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe arising of entities exists because endurance exists when it exists.

original: skye ba med pa la ni gnas pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa la ni gnas pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Endurance does not exist when there is no arising.

original: de'i phyir skye ba yod pas gnas pa yod pa'i phyir gnas pa ni skye ba yod pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba yod pas gnas pa yod pa'i phyir gnas pa ni skye ba yod pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since endurance exists because arising exists, endurance would have arising.

original: de'i phyir skye ba yang yod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba yang yod de /
translated: Therefore, arising also exists.

original: de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it exists, the existent thing exists.

original: 'dir gang med par de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gang med par de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, if something does not exist, the existent thing that exists because of it does not exist.

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog gi dri zhim po bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog gi dri zhim po bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the sweet scent of a flower in the sky.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te de yod na yod pa'i gnas pa nyid yod na ni /
analyzed: gal te de yod na yod pa'i gnas pa nyid yod na ni /
translated: If endurance exists because of the existence of the existent thing,

original: skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: arising would also exist. But it does not exist.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / dngos po gnas pa mi gnas te //üîΩdngos po mi gnas gnas pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dngos po gnas pa mi gnas te // dngos po mi gnas gnas pa yin //
translated: An enduring thing does not endure.üîΩA nonenduring thing does not endure.

original: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te //
analyzed: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te //
translated: An enduring thing does not endure.

original: ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur //
translated: What has not arisen endures.

original: de la @56a * //
analyzed: de la @56a * //
translated: Here,

original: gnas pa ni mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pa ni mi gnas pa ste /
translated: an enduring thing does not endure.

original: de la gnas pa bya ba 'gags zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gnas pa bya ba 'gags zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the activity of enduring has already ceased.

original: dngos po mi gnas pa yang gnas pa ma yin te gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po mi gnas pa yang gnas pa ma yin te gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, a nonenduring thing does not endure because it is devoid of endurance.

original: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te /
translated: That which is in the process of enduring does not endure because

original: gnas pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gnas pa dang mi gnas pa las tha dad pa'i gnas bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gnas pa dang mi gnas pa las tha dad pa'i gnas bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it follows that endurance would be twofold, and that which is in the process of enduring is not separate from endurance and nondurance.

original: gzhan yang ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, what nonarisen thing endures?

original: 'dir skye ba bkag pa'i phyir gang zhig gnas par 'gyur ba ma skyes pa'i dngos po de gang zhig yod /
analyzed: 'dir skye ba bkag pa'i phyir gang zhig gnas par 'gyur ba ma skyes pa'i dngos po de gang zhig yod /
translated: Here, since arising is refuted, what nonarisen thing that exists endures?üîΩTherefore endurance does not exist in any way.

original: de'i phyir gnas pa rnam pa thams cad du med do gzhan yang gnas pa 'di 'gag bzhin pa'am 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa zhig la 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas pa rnam pa thams cad du med do gzhan yang gnas pa 'di 'gag bzhin pa'am 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa zhig la 'gyur grang /
translated: Moreover, would this endurance be of that which is in the process of ceasing or of that which is not in the process of ceasing?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: It is untenable that endurance

original: dngos po 'gag bzhin pa la ni //
analyzed: dngos po 'gag bzhin pa la ni //
translated: Exists for a thing that is ceasing.

original: gnas pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is untenable that endurance

original: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //üîΩde ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //üîΩde ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
translated: Exists for a thing that is not ceasing.

original: re zhig dngos po 'gag bzhin pa 'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'gal ba gnas pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig dngos po 'gag bzhin pa 'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'gal ba gnas pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: First, for an entity that is in the process of ceasing and is about to cease, it is not tenable that endurance exists.

original: gang yang 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa de ni dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang yang 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa de ni dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, that which is not in the process of ceasing would not be an entity.

original: de la gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de la gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could endurance exist for that?

original: gzhan yang dngos po thams cad ni rga ba dang / 'chi bas skad cig tsam yang mi gtong ba yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos po thams cad ni rga ba dang / 'chi bas skad cig tsam yang mi gtong ba yin la /
translated: Moreover, since all entities are not relinquished even for a moment by aging and death,

original: gang gi tshe 'di de lta bu yin pa de'i tshe dngos po rnams la rga ba dang 'chi ba dag dang 'gal ba'i gnas pa 'jug pa'i sgo nas go skabs nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di de lta bu yin pa de'i tshe dngos po rnams la rga ba dang 'chi ba dag dang 'gal ba'i gnas pa 'jug pa'i sgo nas go skabs nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: when this is the case, since there is no opportunity for endurance to engage in the activity of opposing aging and death with respect to entities, it is explained:

original: dngos po thams cad dus kun du //üîΩrga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad dus kun du // rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na //
translated: All entities at all times

original: gang dag rga dang 'chi med par //
analyzed: gang dag rga dang 'chi med par //
translated: Are subject to aging and death.

original: gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin //
analyzed: gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin //
translated: What entity is thereüîΩThat endures without aging and death?

original: gang dag la gnas pa yod par 'gyur ba rga ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba'i dngos po gang zhig yod /
analyzed: gang dag la gnas pa yod par 'gyur ba rga ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba'i dngos po gang zhig yod /
translated: What thing exists that is free from aging and death and that endures?

original: de'i phyir gnas pa med pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas pa med pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, he thinks that endurance does not exist.

original: gzhan yang gnas pa 'di la gnas pa'i ched du gnas pa gzhan zhig rtog gam /
analyzed: gzhan yang gnas pa 'di la gnas pa'i ched du gnas pa gzhan zhig rtog gam /
translated: Moreover, in this endurance, is endurance imagined for the sake of endurance?

original: rang gis rang gi bdag nyid gnas par byed grang na /
analyzed: rang gis rang gi bdag nyid gnas par byed grang na /
translated: Or does it endure itself by itself?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /üîΩgnas pa gnas pa gzhan dang ni //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / gnas pa gnas pa gzhan dang ni //
translated: Both are illogical.üîΩEndurance does not make sense

original: de nyid @56b kyis kyang gnas mi rigs //üîΩji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
analyzed: de nyid @56b kyis kyang gnas mi rigs // ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
translated: For endurance itself or another.üîΩJust as arising does not make sense

original: gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin bzhin //üîΩskye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin bzhin // skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
translated: For itself or another.üîΩHow could arising, not having arisen,

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed //
translated: Cause the generation of itself?

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar skye bas bdag nyid mi bskyed par bshad pa de ltar /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar skye bas bdag nyid mi bskyed par bshad pa de ltar /
translated: As it was explained that arising does not cause the generation of itself,

original: gnas pas kyang bdag nyid gnas par mi byed par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas pas kyang bdag nyid gnas par mi byed par brjod par bya ste /
translated: so endurance also does not cause the endurance of itself.

original: gnas pa 'di ni mi gnas pas //
analyzed: gnas pa 'di ni mi gnas pas //
translated: This endurance does not endure.

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar gnas //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar gnas //
translated: How could it endure by itself?

original: gal te gnas pas gnas byed na //
analyzed: gal te gnas pas gnas byed na //
translated: If endurance causes endurance,

original: gnas na ci zhig gnas su yod //üîΩces sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas na ci zhig gnas su yod // ces sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: what endures that is caused to endure?

original: yang / gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: yang / gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
translated: Moreover, if another arising

original: de bskyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bskyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: causes it to arise, there would be an infinite regress.

original: zhes / ji skad du /
analyzed: zhes / ji skad du /
translated: As it is said,üîΩ‚ÄúIf another arising causes it to arise, there would be an infinite regress.‚Äù

original: skye ba la rnam par bshad pa de bzhin du /üîΩgal te gnas pa gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: skye ba la rnam par bshad pa de bzhin du / gal te gnas pa gzhan zhig gis //
translated: Just as arising is explained,

original: de gnas thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de gnas thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: if another endurance causes it to endure, there would be an infinite regress.

original: zhes gnas pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes gnas pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Endurance should be explained in the same way.

original: de ltar gnas pa yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa yang mi rigs so //
translated: Thus endurance is not tenable.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: Therefore the BhagavƒÅn said:

original: chos 'di dag ni mi gnas te //
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni mi gnas te //
translated: These phenomena do not endure;

original: 'di dag la ni gnas yod min //
analyzed: 'di dag la ni gnas yod min //
translated: they do not have endurance.üîΩEndurance is not tenable

original: gnas med gnas pa'i smras brjod kyang //üîΩrang gi ngo bos rnyed ma yin //
analyzed: gnas med gnas pa'i smras brjod kyang // rang gi ngo bos rnyed ma yin //
translated: in the absence of endurance.üîΩThe Lord of the World did not teach

original: 'jig rten mgon pos gnas pa dang // skye ba bstan pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon pos gnas pa dang // skye ba bstan pa ma yin te //
translated: endurance and arising.

original: des na de lta'i 'jig rten mgon //
analyzed: des na de lta'i 'jig rten mgon //
translated: Therefore the Lord of the World

original: rigs nas ting 'dzin shes par gyis //
analyzed: rigs nas ting 'dzin shes par gyis //
translated: Know that the family is meditative concentration.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
translated: Similarly, the noble Condensed Perfection of Wisdom Sutra also says:

original: mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten //
analyzed: mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten //
translated: The wind rests in space, and the mass of water rests in that.

original: de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba brten //
analyzed: de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba brten //
translated: This great earth rests in that, and the world rests in that.

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and so on.üîΩüîΩ

original: gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs //
analyzed: gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs //
translated: This is said to be the Victor‚Äôs resting, resting without resting.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is extensively taught.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone might say,

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dag ni yod pa nyid do /
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dag ni yod pa nyid do /
translated: arising and enduring exist.

original: de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the phenomena that accompany them exist.

original: 'dir 'dus byas rnams la skye ba dang gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa mi rtag pa nyid yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'dus byas rnams la skye ba dang gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa mi rtag pa nyid yod pa yin te /
translated: Here, impermanence accompanies the characteristics of arising and enduring of conditioned phenomena.

original: de'i phyir skye ba dang gnas pa nyid kyang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba dang gnas pa nyid kyang yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, arising and enduring also exist.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply as follows:

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid yod na ni /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid yod na ni /
translated: If impermanence exists,

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
translated: Arising and enduring would also exist.

original: yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But they do not exist.üîΩHow so?

original: ci ltar zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar / 'gag @57a * //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na / 'di ltar / 'gag @57a * //
translated: Thus:

original: pa 'gag par mi 'gyur te //üîΩma 'gags pa yang 'gag mi 'gyur //
analyzed: pa 'gag par mi 'gyur te // ma 'gags pa yang 'gag mi 'gyur //
translated: cessation does not cease.üîΩThat which has not ceased does not cease.

original: 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min //
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min //
translated: That which is in the process of ceasing does not cease.

original: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur //
translated: What has not arisen does not cease.

original: gal te mi rtag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /üîΩde dngos po 'gags pa 'am ma 'gags pa 'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / de dngos po 'gags pa 'am ma 'gags pa 'am /
translated: If something called ‚Äúimpermanent‚Äù exists,üîΩit would be a thing that has ceased, has not ceased,

original: 'gag bzhin pa zhig la 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa zhig la 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: or is in the process of ceasing.

original: de la 'gags pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de la 'gags pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni mi rung ste /
translated: It is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúThat which has ceased ceases,‚Äù

original: 'das pa dang da ltar ba gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang da ltar ba gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the past and the present are mutually exclusive.

original: ma 'gags pa la yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: ma 'gags pa la yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also not tenable to say, ‚ÄúThat which has not ceased ceases,‚Äù

original: 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang / gang zhig ma 'gags pa ni ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur zhes phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang / gang zhig ma 'gags pa ni ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur zhes phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is devoid of cessation and because it is mutually exclusive to say that which has not ceased ceases.

original: 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min te /
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min te /
translated: That which is in the process of ceasing does not cease.

original: 'gag mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //üîΩ'gag bzhin pa yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gag mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro // 'gag bzhin pa yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not cease‚Äù is to be connected with this.

original: 'gag bzhin pa med pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa med pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is in the process of ceasing does not cease because that which is in the process of ceasing does not exist and because it would follow that cessation would be twofold.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dus gsum kar yang 'gag pa mi srid pa de'i phyir 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dus gsum kar yang 'gag pa mi srid pa de'i phyir 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Since cessation is not possible in any of the three temporal periods in this way, therefore cessation does not exist.

original: de dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i skye ba dang gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i skye ba dang gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could arising and enduring, which coexist with it, exist?

original: gzhan yang sngar skye ba bkag pa'i phyir bkag pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar skye ba bkag pa'i phyir bkag pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Moreover, since arising was previously refuted, it was explained that ‚Äúcessation does not exist.‚Äù

original: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What has not arisen ceases?

original: gzhan yang / 'gag pa 'di dngos po gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa zhig la 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'gag pa 'di dngos po gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa zhig la 'gyur grang na /
translated: Moreover, does this cessation occur in a thing that endures or in a thing that does not endure?

original: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /üîΩre zhig dngos po gnas pa la //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa / re zhig dngos po gnas pa la //
translated: It is explained that neither is tenable:üîΩFirst, cessation is not tenable

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In a thing that endures.

original: 'gag pa dang 'gal ba gnas pa la ni 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gag pa dang 'gal ba gnas pa la ni 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
translated: That which is incompatible with cessation, i.e., endurance, does not have cessation.

original: dngos po ni gnas pa la yang /üîΩ'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po ni gnas pa la yang / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, it is not tenable thatüîΩcessation exists for a thing that endures.

original: dngos po mi gnas pa yod pa ma yin pa la yang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po mi gnas pa yod pa ma yin pa la yang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor does cessation exist for a thing that does not endure.

original: de'i phyir 'gag pa rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gag pa rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, cessation is not tenable in any way.

original: gzhan yang / gal te 'dir 'gag pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te 'dir 'gag pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if cessation were to occur here,

original: de gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid la 'am /
analyzed: de gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid la 'am /
translated: would it be that very state of cessation by that very state,

original: gzhan gyis gzhan la 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan la 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: or would it be another state by another state?

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad de zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /üîΩgnas skabs de yis gnas skabs ni //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad de zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / gnas skabs de yis gnas skabs ni //
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is not tenable in any way, it is said:üîΩThat very state does not cease

original: de nyid 'gag pa nyid mi @57b 'gyur //üîΩgnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs ni //
analyzed: de nyid 'gag pa nyid mi @57b 'gyur // gnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs ni //
translated: by that very state.

original: gzhan yang 'gag pa nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'gag pa nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: Nor does another state ceaseüîΩby another state.

original: re zhig 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid kyis 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid 'gag par ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: re zhig 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid kyis 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid 'gag par ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: First, that very state of milk does not cease by that very state of milk.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory for something to act on itself.

original: gzhan zho'i gnas skabs kyis kyang 'o ma'i gnas skabs 'gag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan zho'i gnas skabs kyis kyang 'o ma'i gnas skabs 'gag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Nor does the state of yogurt stop the state of milk, because

original: yong ni 'o ma dang zho'i gnas skabs gnyis dus gcig tu 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: yong ni 'o ma dang zho'i gnas skabs gnyis dus gcig tu 'gyur na ni /
translated: if the two states of milk and yogurt were to occur at the same time,

original: de gnyis gzhig par bya ba dang 'jig par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de gnyis gzhig par bya ba dang 'jig par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then they would be the object of destruction and the agent of destruction.

original: zho'i gnas skabs na ni 'o ma'i gnas skabs yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zho'i gnas skabs na ni 'o ma'i gnas skabs yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But the state of milk does not exist in the state of yogurt.

original: gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe ni med par 'gyur pa gang zhig 'jig par byed de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe ni med par 'gyur pa gang zhig 'jig par byed de /
translated: When it does not exist, then what nonexistent thing is destroyed?

original: gal te 'jig par byed na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'jig par byed na ni /
translated: If it is destroyed,

original: bong bu'i rva'i rno ba nyid kyang rnam par 'jig par byed par 'gyur ba zhig go //
analyzed: bong bu'i rva'i rno ba nyid kyang rnam par 'jig par byed par 'gyur ba zhig go //
translated: then the sharpness of an ass‚Äôs horn would also be destroyed.

original: de'i phyir gnas skabs gzhan gyis kyang gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas skabs gzhan gyis kyang gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, one state does not stop another state.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: gal te yang gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid dam /
analyzed: gal te yang gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid dam /
translated: If a state stops itself or another state,

original: gnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par mi 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par mi 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: But it is not that one state stops another state.

original: de lta na yang 'o ma'i gnas skabs la ni re zhig 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang 'o ma'i gnas skabs la ni re zhig 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
translated: However, the state of milk does stop at some point.

original: de'i phyir skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, arising also exists.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We say:

original: kye ma ma la khyod ni bdag nyid shin tu blun pa nyid du mngon par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: kye ma ma la khyod ni bdag nyid shin tu blun pa nyid du mngon par byed pa yin te /
translated: Alas! You are clearly revealing yourself to be extremely foolish.

original: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: Because, as explained earlier,

original: gang tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gang tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi //
translated: when the arising of all phenomena

original: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ba //
translated: is not tenable,üîΩthen,

original: bshad pa / de tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi //
analyzed: bshad pa / de tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi //
translated: the cessation of all phenomena

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is not tenable.

original: zhes ches gsal ba nyid du bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes ches gsal ba nyid du bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt this taught in a very clear way?

original: gzhan yang / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
translated: Moreover, if that which is called ‚Äúcessation‚Äù exists,

original: de dngos po yod pa 'am med pa zhig la 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de dngos po yod pa 'am med pa zhig la 'gyur grang /
translated: then it would be either an existent or nonexistent thing.üîΩIn that regard,

original: de la / re zhig dngos po yod pa la //
analyzed: de la / re zhig dngos po yod pa la //
translated: First, cessation of an existent thing

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is not tenable.

original: dngos po yod pa rang bzhin las ma nyams pa la ni 'gag pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa rang bzhin las ma nyams pa la ni 'gag pa mi rigs te /
translated: For a thing that exists and has not lost its intrinsic reality, cessation is not tenable.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Why is that?üîΩIf it were one, it would not be tenable that a thing

original: gcig nyid na ni dngos po dang // dngos po med par 'thad pa med //
analyzed: gcig nyid na ni dngos po dang // dngos po med par 'thad pa med //
translated: is a non-thing.

original: dngos po gang zhig la 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po med @58a * //
analyzed: dngos po gang zhig la 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po med @58a * //
translated: That which is called ‚Äúcessation‚Äù is a non-thing.

original: pa de / yod pa de ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa de / yod pa de ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it exists, it would not be non-existent.

original: de'i phyir dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa yod par smra ba na /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa yod par smra ba na /
translated: Therefore, if you say that a thing that exists has cessation,

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis gzhi gcig pa nyid du khas blangs bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis gzhi gcig pa nyid du khas blangs bar 'gyur la /
translated: you would be accepting that a thing and a non-thing are the same basis.

original: gcig nyid yin na ni gnyi ga mi rigs te /
analyzed: gcig nyid yin na ni gnyi ga mi rigs te /
translated: If they were one, both would be untenable.

original: da lta gal te dngos po yin na ni de'i tshe 'gag pa dngos po med pas zin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da lta gal te dngos po yin na ni de'i tshe 'gag pa dngos po med pas zin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is a thing now, then at that time, since cessation is a non-thing,

original: dngos por bsnyad pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: dngos por bsnyad pa mi rigs so //
translated: it would not be tenable to call it a thing.

original: 'on te dngos po med pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po med pa yin na /
translated: But if it is a non-thing,

original: de yang 'di la mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang 'di la mi rigs te /
translated: that also is not tenable here.

original: dngos po med pa dang 'gal ba dngos po nyid dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang 'gal ba dngos po nyid dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not free from being a thing, which is incompatible with a non-thing.

original: de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gcig nyid yin na dngos po de dngos po ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gcig nyid yin na dngos po de dngos po ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, if things and nonthings were the same, it would be tenable to say that a thing is not a thing,

original: dngos po med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rung ngo //üîΩrnam pa gcig tu na gcig nyid yin na phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar /
analyzed: dngos po med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rung ngo // rnam pa gcig tu na gcig nyid yin na phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar /
translated: and a nonthing is not a nonthing.

original: dngos po yang yin la dngos po med pa yang yin pa mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po yang yin la dngos po med pa yang yin pa mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In another way, if they were the same, it would be untenable for a thing to be a nonthing and vice versa, because they are mutually exclusive, like light and darkness.

original: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa mi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa mi rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this way, first, it is illogical for a thing that exists to cease.

original: da ni / dngos po med par gyur pa la'ang //
analyzed: da ni / dngos po med par gyur pa la'ang //
translated: Now,

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdngos po yod pa ma yin par gyur pa la'ang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po yod pa ma yin par gyur pa la'ang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: cessation is not tenableüîΩFor that which has become nonexistent.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //üîΩmgo gnyis pa la ji ltar ni //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no // mgo gnyis pa la ji ltar ni //
translated: Also, destruction does not exist for that which has become nonexistent, because it does not exist, like a sky flower.üîΩJust asüîΩa second head cannot be cut off,

original: gcad du med pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: gcad du med pa de bzhin no //
translated: so too

original: mgo bo gnyis pa med par rab tu grags pa nyid dper nye bar bkod pa'i phyir bshad pa ma tshang ba nyid du 'gyur bas med pa zhes nye bar ma bkod do //
analyzed: mgo bo gnyis pa med par rab tu grags pa nyid dper nye bar bkod pa'i phyir bshad pa ma tshang ba nyid du 'gyur bas med pa zhes nye bar ma bkod do //
translated: Since the absence of a second head is well known, it is not mentioned as an example.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / de ltar dngos po yod pa dang dngos po med pa la 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de ltar dngos po yod pa dang dngos po med pa la 'gag pa med do //
translated: Thus, an existent thing and a non-existent thing do not cease.

original: gang zhig gnyi ga ltar yang med pa de dag nyid gzhan gang gis yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig gnyi ga ltar yang med pa de dag nyid gzhan gang gis yod par 'gyur te /
translated: If neither of the two exists, how could they exist in any other way?

original: 'gag pa med pa nyid do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa nyid do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that they do not cease.

original: gzhan yang / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po rnams kyis 'gag par byed pa yin no zhes rtog na /
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po rnams kyis 'gag par byed pa yin no zhes rtog na /
translated: Moreover, if you imagine that so-called cessation causes the cessation of things,

original: da ni ci yang 'gag pa gzhan 'dod dam 'on te ma yin /
analyzed: da ni ci yang 'gag pa gzhan 'dod dam 'on te ma yin /
translated: now, is cessation of things asserted to be different or not different?

original: gal te 'dod na ni de mi rigs te /
analyzed: gal te 'dod na ni de mi rigs te /
translated: If it is asserted, that is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩ'gag pa rang gi bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / 'gag pa rang gi bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Why is it so?üîΩCessation does not exist

original: yod min 'gag pa gzhan gyis min //
analyzed: yod min 'gag pa gzhan gyis min //
translated: Through its own nature. Cessation does not exist through another.

original: ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate how it does not exist,

original: ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
translated: Just as arising does not exist

original: gzhan gyis bskyed @58b pa ma yin bzhin //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bskyed @58b pa ma yin bzhin //
translated: Nor is it produced by another.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la ji ltar /üîΩskye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
analyzed: de la ji ltar / skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
translated: In regard to that, just as

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed //üîΩces bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed // ces bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: this arising does not cause the arising of itself,üîΩsince it has not yet arisen,

original: skye bas rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gag pas kyang rang gi bdag nyid 'gag par mi byed do //
analyzed: skye bas rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gag pas kyang rang gi bdag nyid 'gag par mi byed do //
translated: so too cessation does not cause the cessation of itself.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be said:

original: 'gag pa 'di ni ma 'gags pas //üîΩrang gi bdag nyid ji ltar 'gog / ci ste 'gags pas 'gog byed na //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'di ni ma 'gags pas // rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar 'gog / ci ste 'gags pas 'gog byed na //
translated: This cessation does not cause the cessation of itself,üîΩsince it has not yet ceased.üîΩBut if it causes the cessation of itself,

original: 'gags na ci zhig dgag tu yod //
analyzed: 'gags na ci zhig dgag tu yod //
translated: since it has ceased, what is there to be ceased?

original: ces skye ba dang mtshungs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces skye ba dang mtshungs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be said as it was in regard to arising.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'gag pa la rang gi bdag nyid kyis 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gag pa la rang gi bdag nyid kyis 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: cessation does not exist in regard to itself.

original: gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor does it exist in regard to another.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If another arising causes

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa skye ba la bshad pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa skye ba la bshad pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as it is explained in the context of arising,üîΩso it should be stated in the context of cessation:

original: gal te 'jig pa gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te 'jig pa gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If another cessation causes cessation,

original: de 'jig thug pa med par 'gyur //üîΩci ste 'jig med de 'jig na //
analyzed: de 'jig thug pa med par 'gyur // ci ste 'jig med de 'jig na //
translated: there would be an infinite regress.üîΩBut if there is no cessation, then everything would be

original: thams cad de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur //üîΩzhes 'gag pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur // zhes 'gag pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: unchanging.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas 'gag pa'i 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas 'gag pa'i 'gag pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since cessation does not exist even through another, the cessation of cessation does not exist.

original: ci ste 'gag pa la ni 'gag pa med pa nyid do snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ci ste 'gag pa la ni 'gag pa med pa nyid do snyam du sems na /
translated: But if you think that cessation does not have cessation,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is illogical.

original: gal te 'gag pa la 'gag pa med na de'i tshe 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'gag pa la 'gag pa med na de'i tshe 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: If cessation does not have cessation, then because it would be free from cessation,

original: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: the characteristics of conditioned phenomena would be lost.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gal te 'jig pa la 'jig pa brtags pa de lta na yang 'jig pa mi rigs la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gal te 'jig pa la 'jig pa brtags pa de lta na yang 'jig pa mi rigs la /
translated: Therefore, in this way, if you imagine that cessation has cessation, then cessation is illogical.

original: 'on te ma brtags pa de lta na yang mi rigs pas /
analyzed: 'on te ma brtags pa de lta na yang mi rigs pas /
translated: But if you do not imagine that, then it is also illogical.

original: da ni ji ltar gzhan gyis 'jig par 'gyur /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar gzhan gyis 'jig par 'gyur /
translated: How then could it be destroyed by another?

original: ci ste de ltar rnam par dpyad pa yin na khyod la yang 'jig pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: ci ste de ltar rnam par dpyad pa yin na khyod la yang 'jig pa mi rigs te /
translated: But if you analyze it in this way, then destruction is not tenable for you.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig gnyi ga'i skyon yin pa des gcig la brgal bar bya ba ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig gnyi ga'i skyon yin pa des gcig la brgal bar bya ba ma yin no snyam na /
translated: Therefore, since this is a fault for both of us, it is not right to challenge the other.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: bdag la ni brgal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ba nyid de /
analyzed: bdag la ni brgal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ba nyid de /
translated: This challenge does not apply to us.

original: 'di ltar dngos po rnams ni rang nyid rang bzhin med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po rnams ni rang nyid rang bzhin med pa yin la /
translated: Why? Because things are themselves essenceless.

original: de dag kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du gyur pa na /
analyzed: de dag kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du gyur pa na /
translated: And when they are essenceless,

original: ma brtags par grub pa'i tshul gyis byis pa 'di bden par mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyi lam du nye bar 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: ma brtags par grub pa'i tshul gyis byis pa 'di bden par mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyi lam du nye bar 'gro ba yin te /
translated: they become the path of conventions for the na√Øve, who are attached to the idea of true existence, in the manner of not analyzing things.

original: kho bo cag gi ltar @59a * //
analyzed: kho bo cag gi ltar @59a * //
translated: But according to us,

original: na de dag la ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: na de dag la ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the analysis explained above does not apply to them.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dngos po rnams ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar 'thad pa dang bral bar gyur cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dngos po rnams ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar 'thad pa dang bral bar gyur cing /
translated: Worldly things are devoid of justification, like illusions, dreams, and the city of gandharvas.

original: ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten la grub par gyur pas phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyis 'grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig byis pa rnams kyis khas len pa yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten la grub par gyur pas phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyis 'grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig byis pa rnams kyis khas len pa yin no //
translated: Because the eye of the intellect is impaired by the cataracts of ignorance, worldly people accept only that which is established for the world, established by mutual dependence.

original: ji skad du brgya pa las /
analyzed: ji skad du brgya pa las /
translated: As CatuhÔ¨ÅÔ¨Å says,

original: mgal me'i 'khor lo sprul pa dang // rmi lam sgyu ma chu zla dang // khug rna dang ni brag ca dang // smig rgyu sprin dang srid pa mtshungs //üîΩzhes bshad do //
analyzed: mgal me'i 'khor lo sprul pa dang // rmi lam sgyu ma chu zla dang // khug rna dang ni brag ca dang // smig rgyu sprin dang srid pa mtshungs // zhes bshad do //
translated: Like a firebrand wheel, a magical creation, A dream, an illusion, a mirage, An echo, a Ô¨Çy agar, and a cloud, So is the world.

original: de'i phyir / bskyed bya yod na skyed byed dang / skyed byed yod na bskyed bya yod cing /
analyzed: de'i phyir / bskyed bya yod na skyed byed dang / skyed byed yod na bskyed bya yod cing /
translated: Thus, if the produced exists, the producer exists; if the producer exists, the produced exists.

original: 'gag pa yod na dgag bya dang / dgag bya yod na 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gag pa yod na dgag bya dang / dgag bya yod na 'gag pa yod pa yin no //
translated: If cessation exists, the object of cessation exists; if the object of cessation exists, cessation exists.

original: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur bar ga la 'os /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur bar ga la 'os /
translated: Therefore, how could the consequence apply equally to our position, since we accept mundane conventions?

original: gang zhig 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid du khas blangs nas 'dus byas rnams skad cig ma nyid du smra ba de'i ltar na nam mkha'i me tog ltar rgyu med pas 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po rnams skad cig ma nyid dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba rnams 'dus byas nyid du 'ang 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid du khas blangs nas 'dus byas rnams skad cig ma nyid du smra ba de'i ltar na nam mkha'i me tog ltar rgyu med pas 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po rnams skad cig ma nyid dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba rnams 'dus byas nyid du 'ang 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
translated: For those who assert that destruction is causeless and who say that compounded phenomena are momentary, since there is no destruction due to the absence of a cause, like a sky flower, how could they establish that things are momentary and that things devoid of destruction are compounded?

original: de'i phyir de'i thams cad mi 'grig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i thams cad mi 'grig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, everything for them would be untenable.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyang 'du byed kyi phung po'i nang du 'du bar gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyang 'du byed kyi phung po'i nang du 'du bar gsungs pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúAging and death occur due to the condition of birth‚Äù and the statement that the characteristics of conditioned phenomena are included within the aggregate of formation are made in terms of the world.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
translated: Hasn‚Äôt the BhagavƒÅn clearly taught that destruction has a cause?

original: skye ba tsam la ltos pa'i phyir 'di'i skad cig mar 'jig pa yang bsgrub par sla ste /
analyzed: skye ba tsam la ltos pa'i phyir 'di'i skad cig mar 'jig pa yang bsgrub par sla ste /
translated: Since it is dependent on mere arising, it is easy to establish that it is momentary.

original: de'i phyir thams cad legs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad legs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, everything is well established.

original: ci ste 'jig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dngos po med pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste 'jig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dngos po med pa yin na /
translated: But if this so-called destruction is a non-thing,

original: gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed /
translated: what would a cause do for a non-thing?

original: de'i phyir 'jig pa rgyu med pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig pa rgyu med pa yin no snyam na /
translated: Therefore, destruction is causeless.

original: dngos po la yang rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po la yang rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But doesn‚Äôt it follow that things would also be causeless?

original: 'di ltar dngos po ni yod par gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po ni yod par gyur pa yin la /
translated: In this way, a thing would come to exist.

original: yod pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: yod pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
translated: What need is there for a cause of that which exists?

original: skyes zin pa la ni yang bskyed du med do //
analyzed: skyes zin pa la ni yang bskyed du med do //
translated: That which has already arisen does not arise again.

original: de'i phyir thams cad du rgyu med par @59b thal bar 'gyur bas 'di ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad du rgyu med par @59b thal bar 'gyur bas 'di ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, because it follows that everything would be causeless, this is not reasonable.

original: gzhan yang ji ltar sngar med pa'i phyir dang / phyis yod pa'i phyir skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji ltar sngar med pa'i phyir dang / phyis yod pa'i phyir skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Moreover, just as arising has a cause because it did not exist previously and exists later,

original: 'jig pa yang yin par 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa yang yin par 'dod par bya'o //
translated: so too should cessation be accepted.

original: 'jig pa yang thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig pa yang thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that cessation occurs at all times,

original: skye ba'i sngar med pa'i phyir dang / phyis ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i sngar med pa'i phyir dang / phyis ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it did not exist previously, like arising, and it exists later.

original: gang yang gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed ces smras pa de yang mi rigs te /üîΩgang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang yang gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed ces smras pa de yang mi rigs te / gang gi phyir /
translated: Moreover, it is illogical to say, ‚ÄúWhat use is a cause for that which is a nonentity?‚Äù

original: kho bo cag ni 'jig pa la rgyus cung zad cig byed par ni mi 'dod kyi /üîΩ'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni 'jig pa la rgyus cung zad cig byed par ni mi 'dod kyi / 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Because we do not assert that a cause does anything at all to cessation.

original: 'on kyang 'jig pa nyid byed pa yin no zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig pa nyid byed pa yin no zhes smras so //
translated: But we do say that a cause produces cessation itself.

original: gal te de lta na byed bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa yang dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na byed bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa yang dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then because it is being produced, is cessation not a thing?

original: 'di ni 'dod pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod pa nyid yin te /
translated: This is precisely what we assert.

original: 'jig pa ni rang gi ngo bo la ltos nas dngos po yin la /
analyzed: 'jig pa ni rang gi ngo bo la ltos nas dngos po yin la /
translated: Destruction is a thing in dependence on its own nature.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos log pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na ni dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos log pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na ni dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: But since the nature of the cessation of phenomena such as form is to be a nonthing, it is a nonthing.

original: gzhan yang 'chi ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'chi ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, death is engaged in two actions:üîΩit causes the destruction of compounded phenomena and it produces the cause of the uninterrupted continuum of ignorance.

original: 'du byed 'jig par yang byed pa dang / yongs su mi shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba'i lung las ni ji ltar 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du byed 'jig par yang byed pa dang / yongs su mi shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba'i lung las ni ji ltar 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: How could destruction be causeless?

original: gzhan yang / gzhan gyis brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid dngos po'i ngo bor khas blangs pa na ji ltar dngos po med pa dngos po nyid du khas ma blangs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan gyis brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid dngos po'i ngo bor khas blangs pa na ji ltar dngos po med pa dngos po nyid du khas ma blangs par 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, when you accept that emptiness, which has the characteristic of a nonthing imagined by others, is the nature of a thing, how could you not accept that a nonthing is a thing?

original: dngos po yin pa'i phyir na yang ji ltar stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas yin te /
analyzed: dngos po yin pa'i phyir na yang ji ltar stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas yin te /
translated: And how could emptiness be uncompounded, since it is a thing?

original: de'i phyir khas blangs pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir khas blangs pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, all of your assertions are undermined.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason, it will be explained:
